column1:
L'Apartament és molt còmode i pràctic per aquells que utilitzem l'Aeroport de París-Beauvais amb Ryanair. És a dues passes de Porte Maillot i a tocar (200mts) de dues estacions de metro que permeten la major part de combinacions directes (Argentine i sobretot Étoile Charles De Gaulle), en aquesta darrera també hi ha parada de RER per anar a les afores (Versailles, Eurodisney...). El carrer hi ha petits supermercats i botigues de queviures, fleques, algun restaurant, cafeteries, el típic quiosc a on es ven premsa internacional, també, etc. No és el Marais, ni Montmartre, ni Sant Germain dp, d'acord, però et permet fer el que vulguis en totes direccions. 
És net, acollidor, potser petit, però no cal res més, tot és a l'abast.
El que més pot sorprendre al nou visitant és que tombant el carrer et trobes amb l'Arc de Triomf a tocar. 
L'immoble és ben tranquil, en 8 dies només ens vàrem creuar amb 2 o 3 veïns.
column5:
The Apartment is very comfortable and practical for those who use the Airport of Paris-Beauvais with Ryanair. It is a few steps from Porte Maillot and near (200mts) from two metro stations that allow the majority of combinations of direct (Argentine and especially Etoile Charles De Gaulle), in the latter there is also a stop of the RER to go to the suburbs (Versailles, Eurodisney, etc.). The street there are small supermarkets and grocery stores, bakeries, a restaurant, cafés, the typical kiosk where they sell international newspapers, also, etc. It is not the Marais or Montmartre or Saint Germain dp, ok, but lets you do what you want in all directions. 
It is clean, cozy, perhaps little, but you don't need anything more, everything is available.
The more you can surprise the new visitor is that the end of the street you come across the Arc de Triomphe in touch. 
The property is very quiet, in 8 days only, we cross with 2 or 3 neighbors.

column1: 我们一家六口到巴黎旅游(有两位七十岁以上的老人),patrick的房源位置非常好,干净舒适,有家的味道,由于是老房子,隔音不太好,但不影响居住,有一个小电梯,非常方便老人上下｡步行到凯旋门十分钟,步行到地铁站乘坐地铁到巴黎春天二十分钟,距离面包店､超市及自由市场均在十分钟的步行行程内,非常方便,而且生活用品齐全(柴米油盐酱醋茶都有),非常方便自己做饭｡patrick是一个非常好的房东,通讯及时,当我们感觉房间比较冷的时候,给Patrick发了一条信息,管家Marta很快就上楼帮助我们调试了取暖设备,使房间的温度很快的上升了,让我们度过了一个温暖的假期｡Marta虽然只会法语和葡萄牙语,但是肢体语言丰富,不影响我们的沟通,是个非常热情的人｡Partrick和 Marta让我们在人生地不熟的巴黎感受到家人般的关心｡
column5: Our family of six to Paris Tour(two seventy-year-old or older),patrick listings location very good,clean comfortable,has home of taste,as is the old house,soundproofing is not very good,but does not affect the living,there is a small Elevator,very convenient for the elderly up and down the room. Walk to the Arc de Triomphe in ten minutes,walk to the metro station, take the Metro to Paris in the spring of twenty minutes,from the bakery, and supermarkets and the free market are within ten minutes walk of the trip,very convenient,and supplies furnished(柴米油盐酱醋茶 are there),very easy to cook by yourself as well. patrick is a very good landlord,a communication time,when we feel the room is cold,give Patrick a piece of information,the housekeeper Marta quickly upstairs to help us debug the heating device,so that the room temperature quickly rose,so we spent a warm vacation home. Marta although only French and Portuguese,but the body language is rich,does not affect our communication,is a very passionate person. Partrick and Marta let us in unfamiliar Paris feel the family-like care home.

column1:
El apartamento de Claude es perfecto para estar en París y poder vivr como un parisino. Usted puede caminar desde allí al barrio latino, a Notre Dame, pasar por la isla de la Cité y sin esfuerzo podrá llegar al Louvre, el arco del triunfo y la Torre Eiffel. En la esquina esta el Boulevar de Sebastopol y a unos 200 m el centro G. Pompidou. Además Claude es un buen anfitrión y les dará buenos tips para que su visita a la bella ciudad de París sea más placentera.

The Claude's flat is perfect to stay in Paris and to live like a Parisian. You can walk from ther to latin quarter, Notre Dame, Arc de Triunfe, Eiffel tower, Louvre. Just at the corner you have Sebastopol Boulevar and 200 m Centre G. Pompidou. In adition Claude is a great host and I am not lying you if I say he will give you many good tips making your Paris' trip more easy.
column5:
The apartment of Claude is perfect to be in Paris and be able to live like a parisian. You can walk from there to the Latin quarter, Notre Dame cathedral, pass by the island of the Cité, and without effort you can reach the Louvre, the arc de triomphe and the Eiffel Tower. In the corner is the Boulevard of Sevastopol, and about 200 m to the centre G. Pompidou. In addition, Claude is a good host and give good tips for your visit to the beautiful city of Paris to be more enjoyable.

The Claude''s flat is perfect to stay in Paris and to live like a Parisian. You can walk from ther to latin quarter, Notre Dame, Arc de Triumph, Eiffel tower, Louvre. Licia 和 Clem是很親切的房東,他們的房子非常乾淨可愛,臥室也很舒服,附近有地鐵站跟公車站,交通非常便捷｡他們住家的社區很安靜單純(復古的電梯對我來說很特別,很喜歡),很安全｡社區斜對面就是超級市場,走路三分鐘可以到巴士底市集｡

抵達巴黎之前,他們給了我很清楚的交通資訊,雖然第一天因為行李延誤的關係,無法準時跟他們碰面,他們還是做好了安排,所以一切都很順利｡ 

Clem也提供了許多巴黎私房景點,非常熱心｡

總體而言我推薦Licia & Clem的房間:)))

Their homes the community is quiet simple(retro Elevator for me very special,and very favorite),very safe area. Community diagonally across is the supermarket,walk three minutes to the Bastille market area.

Clem also provides a number of Parisian private houses attractions,very enthusiastic and great views.

Overall I recommend Licia & Clem's room:)))

조용한 주택가에 위치하며, 12호선 등 도보 10분 내에 지하철역이 있습니다. 빵, 과일, 고기 등을 살 수 있는 상점과 슈퍼마켓 등이 집근처에 위치하고 있으며, Coin Laundry도 근처에 있어 이용이 편리합니다. 에펠탑까지는 걸어서 약15분 정도 소요됩니다.

2. 숙소시설
사진에서 보는 것과 동일합니다. 2명이 지내기 적합한 공간입니다. 욕실은 작은 편이나 샤워 공간이 별도로 구분되어 있습니다.  주반도 별도로 구분되어있고, 전기레인지와  냉장고, 전자레인지 등이 있습니다. 와아파이 신호가 약하여 실내에서는 이용하기 힘듭니다.

column1: Excellent location. A lovely, cozy apartment.

column1:
The flat is comfortable, well equipped and clean, linens and towels too. The neighbourhood seemed to be very safe. 
We loved the location. Very close to the Seine river, Latin Quarter as your """"backyard', close to 6th district, Ile de la cité. 
There are nearby shops, restaurants and metro stops + many tourist attractions are within walking distance. We were addicted to the Crepes served just around the corner. 
The studio apartment is perfect for a young couple like ourselves. It was exactly as advertised and Sam was a great host. With limited communication we met at the prearranged time. 
He gave us a few insider's tips on restaurants and the one we went to was excellent. The free Wi-Fi came very handy when googling what to do in Paris. 
The small kitchen, fridge and shower offer what they promise, neighbours are friendly and because the studio is in the first floor in the inner courtyard you don't get disturbed by the street noise.
We'd quite happily stay here again

El apartamento es confortable, agradable, bien equipado, con sábanas y toallas limpias también. La cercanía es segura. Nos gustó mucho la localización del piso. Muy cerca del rio de La Seine, detrás del Barrio Latino y cerca del distrito número 6, la Isla de la """"Cité"""". Tiendas cercanas, restaurantes y estaciones de metro también. Nos comíamos cada día unas """"Crepes"""" en la esquina de la calle. 
El apartamento es perfecto para una pareja joven como nosotros. Era tal y como la descripción lo decía y Sam es un anfitrión fantástico!! Nos comunicamos poco con él antes, y nos encontramos perfectamente en la hora prevista de llegada. Nos aconsejó varios restaurantes y él que elijimos fue excelente. El wifi gratis fue de mucha ayuda a la hora de buscar lo que se tenía que ver en Paris. 
El estudio es perfecto para no alcanzar un presupuesto en Paris porque esta muy bien situado.
No tuvimos ningún problema con la pequeña cocina, la nevera o la ducha. El barrio es agradable y siendo un primer piso dentro de un patio ajaradinado, el ruido de la calle no molesta en nada.
Volveremos a alquilar este apartamento sin duda.

column1: 民宿位于一个非常有活力的街区,交通方便,周边治安感觉也不错｡这里可以乘地铁在半个小时左右抵达卢浮宫､奥赛博物馆,巴黎圣母院的距离更近,天气好甚至值得步行前往｡在民宿周边吃早餐晚餐会比香榭丽舍大道､卢浮宫一带的餐馆更加美味地道,热情的老板Carole可以给你提供很详细的周边餐馆的情报,其中部分餐馆非常有名,最好提前预定｡该民宿的主要问题是天花板很低(隔音不好)且唯一的窗户很小,有时可能会给部分租客压抑的感觉｡从街道通向民宿的里弄给我印象深刻,真有一种曲径通幽的感觉｡以后再来巴黎的话,依然会考虑在巴士底这一带选择住宿｡

Decisamente una bellissima esperienza.

A very romantic view of the Pantheon's dome from the bed...
Definitely a wonderful experience.

column1: És un apartament fantàstic!! Immillorable!! La situació és genial (està a prop de tot) i està molt ben comunicat (metro, a peu o bici). L'apartament és molt tranquil perquè dóna a un pati interior però que té molta llum, sembla que estiguis apartat de la ciutat però quan surts al carrer hi ha molta vida i està ple de comerços, restaurants i bars genials amb gent a totes hores. L'apartament és molt acollidor i per a dues persones és genial, té de tot i ets sents com a casa. El vàrem trobar net i endreçat, amb el llit fet i les tovalloles a punt. És un quart sense ascensor però al segon dia que puges les escales ja te n'oblides que està tant amunt, no és cap problema! L'Agathe és una noia molt maca i agradable i ens va recomanar llocs on anar a prendre alguna cosa i espectacles alternatius. Estem molt agraïts d'aquesta experiència! 100% recomanable!
column5: It is a fantastic apartment!! Unbeatable!! The location is great (close to everything) and is very well communicated (metro, walk, or bike). The apartment is very quiet because it overlooks an interior courtyard but that has a lot of light, it seems that you're section of the city, but when you are on the street there are a lot of life and is full of shops, restaurants and bars, and is great with people at all hours. The apartment is very cosy and for two people it is great, has everything and you feel like home. We found clean and tidy, with the bed made and towels ready. It is a quarter without a lift but on the second day that you upload the stairs because you will forget that you are both up, it is no problem! The Agathe is a very nice girl and pleasant and we recommend places where to go to take something and shows alternative. We are very grateful for this experience! 100% recommended!

column1:
L'apartament és magnífic i està ben ubicat, però no està prou net i té problemes de manteniment. En un apartament d'aquest preu això no és admissible. 
Vam avisar de l'horari del nostre vol i vam anar directes des de l'aeroport, però ningú ens va poder rebre i vam haver de recollir les claus en un bar. No hem pogut veure ningú que ens donés cap informació. Només hem pogut contactar per email.
Només hi havia una clau, i en un apartament per a set persones adultes (o més) això és un seriós inconvenient. Tot i comentar-ho no es va poder resoldre. Tampoc es va resoldre la manca tota d'il·luminació a l'escala, que resulta perillosa.
En resum un lloc magnífic, que si estes ben net i mantingut seria extraordinari, però malauradament no ho és.
column5:
The apartment is magnificent and is well located, but it is not clean enough and has maintenance problems. In an apartment of this price this is not admissible. 
We announce the schedule of our flight and we went direct from the airport, but nobody was able to receive and we had to pick up the keys at a bar. We have not been able to see anyone that we would give any information. We were only able to contact us by email.
There was only one key, and in an apartment for seven adults (or more) this is a serious drawback. Even commented it was not able to resolve. Nor did he solve the lack of any lighting on the stairs, that's dangerous.
In summary a fantastic place, that if these well clean and maintained it would be extraordinary, but unfortunately it is not.

column1:
Lamentablement no podem parlar positivament d'aquest apartament i per tant, no el recomanem gens. Teníem quatre nits reservades però després de la primera nit ja vam marxar, notificant-ho al propietari.
Els motius: l'apartament era MOLT petit. Tant, que si s'obria el sofà-llit, gairebé no es podia obrir la porta d'entrada ni accedir al bany. 
Durant la nit, va ser impossible descansar degut a que se sentien els passos i cops de porta dels veïns, la incomoditat del llit,  el soroll de la nevera i el soroll de l'extractor d'olors del bany. A més a més, quan algú accedia al bany, no hi havia privacitat degut a que la porta d'aquest era transparent. Tot i que l'apartament estava net, se sentia olor d'humitat.
Per tant, tot i ser un lloc econòmic per la seva ubicació, no recomanem aquest allotjament,
column5:
Unfortunately we can not speak positively of this apartment and therefore do not recommend it at all. We had four nights booked but after the first night as we leave, by notifying it to the owner.
The reasons: the apartment was VERY small. So, if we opened the sofa-bed, almost could not open the door of entry or access to the bathroom. 
During the night, it was impossible to rest due to the fact that they feel the steps and knocks the door of the neighbors, the discomfort of the bed, the noise of the refrigerator and the noise of the extractor of odors from the toilet. In addition, when someone was gaining access to the bathroom, there was no privacy due to the fact that the door of this was transparent. Although the apartment was clean, felt a smell of humidity.
Therefore, despite being an economical for your location, we do not recommend this accommodation,

column1: 这套房子在一栋典型的巴黎老房子的顶层,有一部小小的电梯可以到达(巴黎好多老房子是没有电梯的)｡房子所处的位置太棒了,交通､生活都非常方便｡附近就有地铁7号线,可以到达大部分的景点,如果去卢浮宫､奥赛､歌剧院,坐楼下的27路公交车更方便｡附近蔬果店､甜品店､餐厅､家乐福一应俱全｡周末热闹的集市就是从家门口开始,一直延续到日耳曼大街｡主人John热情细心,让人有宾至如归的感觉,虽然在老房子里,但房间布置得很有品味,实际比图片还漂亮｡两扇落地玻璃门外是小小的阳台,可以喝茶 畅聊 看夕阳 看街景｡但整套房子毕竟不是很大,两张床白天都要收起来的,厨房､卫生间也不大｡总之,如果你想体验巴黎人的生活,这是相当不错的选择,但如果你习惯了宽大洁净明亮的星级酒店,那还是另选其它吧｡

column1:
¡El departamento de Alix es perfecto y ella es muy amable! A pesar de que nuestro vuelo se retrasó y por lo tanto llegamos una hora tarde de lo acordado, Alix nos esperó en su departamento para entregárnoslo. 
Inmediatamente nos hizo sentir bienvenidos y nos recomendó algunos lugares para cenar, supermercados, y nos dio toda la información necesaria.

(Les recomiendo cenar en Le Café, justo al lado del edificio, prueben la Lasagna con una copa de vino tinto de la casa)

Su departamento es perfecto. Es hermoso, agradable, limpio y muy tranquilo. Tiene todos los elementos para cocinar (excepto microondas, aunque no es necesario). 
Las camas son muy cómodas.

Está en el primer piso del edificio al cual puedes llegar por escaleras o elevador.
El barrio en el que está es muy animado pero sin ruido. Cerca hay tiendas, cafés, fruterías, panaderías. Está cerca del Metro y a 10 minutos del Musée du Louvre.
Definitivamente me quedaría de nuevo.

¡Gracias Alix por permitirnos estar en tu departamento, eres la anfitriona perfecta!


Alix apartment is perfect, and she is very kind! Although our flight was delayed and we arrived one hour late, she waited us there as we agreed.
She immediately made us feel welcome, and recommended us places to dine, supermarkets and gave us all the necessary information.

(I highly recommend to eat at Le Café, and try the lasagna with red wine) 

Her apartment is cozy, beautiful, clean, and very quiet. The kitchen has all the elements you need to cook.
And the beds are so comfortable!

It's on the first floor of the building which you can reach trough elevator or stairs. Around the building are many shops, supermarkets, fruit stores, and bakeries with delicious cakes and bread.

I would definitely return to her apartment. Thanks for everything Alix, you're the perfect host!
column5:
The department of Alix is perfect and she is very friendly! Despite the fact that our flight was delayed and so we arrived an hour later than agreed, Alix waited us in the apartment to provide it to us.

(I recommend dinner at Le Coffee, just to the side of the building, try the Lasagna with a glass of red wine of the house)

Your apartment is perfect. It is beautiful, friendly, clean and very quiet. It has all the elements for cooking (except microwave, although it is not necessary). 
The beds are very comfortable.

It is on the first floor of the building which you can reach by stairs or elevator.
The neighborhood is very lively but no noise. Near there are shops, cafes, fruit shops, bakeries. Is close to the Metro and 10 minutes from the Musée du Louvre.
I would definitely stay again.

Thank you Alix for letting us be in your department, you are the perfect host!

column1: Un habitatge amb encant. Silenciós i tranquil. Ben comunicat. Quan superes el primer impacte és genial, ple de color i escenari pintoresc, però potser a segons quines hores del vespre el panorama pot disgustar algú i -en arribar en metro de nit- potser convé vigilar la bossa.

column1:
Well, staying at Bruno and Etienne's house was just GREAT!
These two are wonderful people, and they really make you feel at home... Their place is really clean, and I really think staying there is better than staying in hotel, because they're really helpful and they make your Parisian stay wonderful... I definitely recommend and I would certainly come back... I just have to thank them for all. 
-
Beh, i giorni trascorsi da Bruno e Etienne sono stati ottimi! Loro due sono persone meravigliose, e fanno di tutto perché tu ti senta a casa.... Il loro appartamento è pulitissimo, e credo veramente che sia meglio di un hotel, perché ti aiutano con qualsiasi cosa tu abbia bisogno e sicuramente il tuo soggiorno sarà più """"parigino""""....  Li consiglierei a chiunque e certamente vi ritornerei... Non posso fare altro che ringraziarli... :) 
-
Bom, ficar na casa do Bruno e do Etienne foi muito legal! Eles são duas pessoas maravilhosas... O apartamento é MUITO limpo e acho que é até melhor que um hotel, porque eles te ajudam com tudo o que você precisar... Eu realmente acho que vale a pena ficar na casa deles e com certeza voltaria lá sem problemas... Só tenho que agradecê-los... =]

column1:
Hemos estado una semana en la casa de Ophelie y archi. A pesar de que llegamos muy tarde a su casa Ophelie nos recibió con una sonrisa y una gran amabilidad y cariño. La casa es preciosa responde perfectamente a las fotos. Lo unico que echamos de menos es un poco mas de luz para leer, pero es algo menor. La casa es luminosa de dia, decorada con mucho gusto y es muy comoda. Ophelie nos puso dos camas extras y dormimos genial la casa es muy silenciosa! El metro belleville esta aun paseito, por la Rue belleville llena de comercios de barrio interesantísimos. El centro esta a 10 minutos!! en el increíblemente rapido metro francés.
¿que mas puedo decir? El parque de Buttes chaumont esta muy cerca y es un precioso parque tipico del romanticismo: en definitiva un alojamiento 100% recomendable.

We stayed a week at the home of Ophelie and Archi. Although we arrived late to her house Ophelie welcomed us with a smile and a great kindness and affection. The house is perfectly described with the photos you can find here. The only thing I miss is a little more light to read, but is somewhat not very important. The house is bright by day, tastefully decorated and very comfortable. Ophelie put us two extra beds and slept great as the house is very quiet! The metro is quite near, just a little walk far going dow the Rue Belleville.  Rue Belleville is typical french street full of very interesting shops. The center is 10 minutes away !  We got there incredibly fast with the Paris underground.
What else I can say? The Buttes Chaumont park is very close to a lovely park and is typical of Romanticism: As conclusion 100% recommended accommodation
 
Nous avons passé une semaine à la maison d'Ophélie et de Archi. Même si nous sommes arrivés tard dans sa maison Ophelie nous a accueillis avec un sourire et une grande gentillesse et d'affection. La maison est parfaitement décrit dans les photos présentées ici. La seule chose qui me manque, c'est un peu plus de lumière pour lire, mais ce n´est pas très important. La maison est lumineuse par jour, décoré avec goût et très confortable. Ophelie nous a mis deux lits d'appoint et nou avons très bien dormi comme la maison est très calme! Le métro n´est pas loin, seulement une petit promenade par la rue Belleville, sur la rue Belleville quartier regorge de boutiques très intéressantes. Le centre est à 10 minutes! incroyablement rapide dans l'underground parisien.
Qu'est-ce que je peux dire? Le parc des Buttes Chaumont est très proche d'un joli parc, typique du romantisme finalement 100% hébergement recommandé.

Merci beacoup!!

(Archi: j´ai lu  MOI RENE TARDI, PRISONNIER DE GUERRE AU STALAG II B.  Soigneusement bien sûr!! J'aimais beaucoup)

column1:
아이들과 같이 여름 휴가를 보내고 왔습니다. 예쁜 인테리어 장식들과 다채로운 조명이 멋진, 세련되고 아늑한 집이었습니다.

집 내부.
복층 구조로 1층은 부엌, 거실, 침실(+샤워실)이 연결되어 있고, 2층은 침실과 욕실(+욕조)이 있습니다. 채광과 통풍이 매우 좋습니다. 창을 열면 늘 시원한 바람이 불었습니다. 집 안 물건은 청결하고 잘 정돈되어 있었습니다. 집주인인 Letizia는 무척 친절했고, 도착 시 메트로, 마트 위치 등 주변 시설 이용에 대해 잘 설명해 주었습니다. 레고, 보드 게임 등 아이들이 놀 수 있는 도구들도 많아 아이들이 즐겁게 시간을 보냈습니다.

교통 및 주변 시설.
지하철 까지는 걸어서 10분 거리에 있으며, 4/8/9호선이 지나고 있어 파리를 관광하는데 아주 편했습니다. 주변에 까르푸 익스프레스 등 많은 마트가 있어 식료품을 사기에 편했습니다. 마레 지구까지 15~20분 정도 걸어서 갈 수 있어, 저녁 산책하기에 좋았습니다.

그 외 특장점, 감동.
각종 티, 아이스크림, 과자, 소스, 잼 등이  무척 다양하게 많이 있었고, 샴푸 등도 수십 종이 비치되어 있었습니다. Letizia는 뭐든지 자유롭게 먹어도 되며, 맘편하게 사용하라고 해서 좀 놀랐습니다.
집이 꼭대기 층이라 전망이 좋습니다. 거실에 좋은 오디오가 있어 저녁에 음악 들으며 와인 한 잔 하면 참 기분이 좋았습니다.

유일한 단점.
유일한 단점은 집이 5층인데 옛날 건물이라 엘리베이터가 없습니다. 크게 불편하진 않았으나, 나이드신 분이나 계단 오르내리기가 힘드신 분에게는 불편함이 될 수 있습니다.

결론.
저희 가족이 다음에 파리를 여행갈 때도 이용하고픈 좋은 숙소입니다. 가족 단위로 여행하시는 분들이 자신의 집과 같이 편리하게 이용할 아파트를 찾으신다면 적극 추천합니다.
column5:
Children like to spend the summer holiday. Pretty interior decorations with colorful lighting is wonderful, stylish and cozy the house was.

The inside of the House.
Multi-layer structure 1 layer is the kitchen, living room, bedroom(+shower)attached, 2 floor, bedroom with bathroom(+bathtub). Light and airy and very good. Open the window to increase the cool wind blew. The house stuff is clean and well trimmed. Landlord, Letizia is very friendly and, arrival at Metro, such as the location surrounding the use of the facilities for better description. LEGO, Board games etc children can play with the tools that will make children entertained and spent time.

Transportation and surrounding facilities.
Subway walk from 10 minute, 4/8/9 lines Paris sightseeing very easy. Around Carrefour Express and many more have groceries in the room. Now up to 15~20 minutes walk, the evening walk was good.

Other features, impressed.
Various tea, ice cream, pastry, sauce, jam, etc what a variety there was a lot of, shampoo etc are also dozens of paper Beach. Letizia is anything not freely eat, and easy to use and a little surprised.
House top floor as the view is good. In the living room, a good audio there in the evening, music and a glass of wine to feel good.

The only disadvantages.
The only drawback is the house 5 Floor old building without Elevator. To not, but this older or stairs and is hard you that discomfort can be.

Conclusion.
Our family then at Paris to travel when this is a good place to stay. As a family unit trip to a house of their own and like to apartment to find.

column1:
DEUTSCH:
Die Wohnung ist zweistöckig. Groß und sehr gemütlich. Die Lage ist ausgezeichnet: 4 Minuten zu Fuß bis „Notre Dame de Paris“. Metro 50 Meter entfernt, Produkt-Laden 10 Meter entfernt, schöne Bäckerei, die sich früh öffnet – 50 Meter entfernt und ein unvergessliches Restaurant der Meeresfrüchte – 30 Meter entfernt.
Alece ist sehr nett. Die Wohnung ist sauber. Man hat alles: Waschmaschine, Bügeleisen, Föhn, Spülmaschine, schnelles WiFi.
Wir würden diese Wohnung jedem Hotel bevor ziehen.

RUSSISCH:
Мы провели отличное время в Париже, так же благодаря Алис. Она нас встретила, рассказала о ближайших кафе, ресторанах, магазине, метро. 
Квартира очень уютная и по французским меркам – большая. Она состоит из двух этажей – на первом этаже: зал и кухня, на втором этаже: спальная комната и ванная. Окна выходят во внутренний двор дома. Можно открыть балкон и спокойно сидеть за столом любуясь небом.
Все было очень чисто, красиво, уютно – лучше, чем в отеле. Для нас была приготовлена бутылка вина и соки, чай, кофе…
Есть стиральная машина, утюг, фен, посудомоечная, быстрый WiFi..., в общем всё.
Расположение просто шикарное: в 10 метрах магазин, где можно купить любые продукты. В 1 минуте ходьбы – метро. В 2х минутах ходьбы – кафе-пекарня, которая рано открывается и можно хорошо позавтракать. Так же в двух шагах есть отличный ресторан с морепродуктами.
До Нотр Дам де Пари – около 4 минут ходьбы. 
В общем – мы провели незабываемые дни в Париже! Спасибо Алис!!!

ESPAÑOL:
La casa es perfecta. La locacion en el centro. Hay de todo: cafes, restaurants, tienda. Hasta el Metro – 1 minuto andando, hasta Notre Dame de Paris – 4 minutos andando. El barrio es muy bonito. La casa es grande, limpia y la propietaria es muy maja! Hay lavadora, la plancha, secador, WiFi es muy rapido. Nosotros viajamos mucho y intentamos ahora siempre cuando venimos a Paris quedar en esta casa! Muchas gracias a Alice!!!

ENGLISCH:
We have really enjoyed our stay in Paris, well because Paris is amazing and also thanks to Alice and her very comfortable place with great location close to Notre Dame. She was patiently waiting for our bus from CDG( always choose the train if you don’t like traffic jams), showed us This place is wonderful with amazing location very close to Notre Dame. We were truly  blessed to choose Alice appartment because she is great host. Thank you Alice!
column5:
ENGLISH:
The apartment is two-storied. Large and very comfortable. The location is excellent: a 4-minute walk to "Notre Dame de Paris". Metro 50 metres away, product Download 10 meters away, nice bakery, which opens early – 50 metres away and a memorable Restaurant in the seafood – 30 meters away.
Alece is very nice. The apartment is clean. It has everything: washing machine, iron, hair dryer, dishwasher, fast WiFi.
We would consider this apartment to any Hotel before.

column1: Espectacular departamento en una ubicación inmejorable. El metro a una cuadra, el supermercado Monoprix a la vuelta, el Café de Flore enfrente, las mejores tiendas sobre el Boulevard Saint Germain. Cerca para ir caminando a Notredamme, al Louvre, a la Conciergerie, la Saint Chapelle, y mucho más. Repetiría sin dudarlo. Diane es un 10 como anfitriona.
column5: Spectacular apartment in an unbeatable location. The metro one block away, the supermarket Monoprix on the way back, the Café de Flore in front, the finest shops on the Boulevard Saint Germain. Close to walk to Notredamme, the Louvre, the Conciergerie, the Saint Chapelle, and much more. I would repeat without hesitation. Diane is a 10 as a host.

column1:
Es tracta d'un apartament confortable, sense sorolls, suficient per passar una setmana a Paris. Situat molt a prop de la Gare de Lyon i de la Plaça de la Bastilla. Molt ben comunicat. Té un quarto de bany molt ben dissenyat i la cuina ben dotada d'estris. El llit també molt bé. Tot en conjunt fa que l'estada sigui immillorable. 
Hem d'afegir que hi ha assecador (de cabells). Això no consta en la informació general de l’apartament.
column5:
It is an apartment, comfortable, without noise, enough to spend a week in Paris. Located very close to the Gare de Lyon and the Place de la Bastille. Very well connected. It has a fully bathroom very well designed and the kitchen well equipped with utensils. The bed is also very good. All together makes the stay unforgettable. 
We must add that there is a hairdryer (hair dryer). This is not stated in the general information of the apartment.

column1: 第一次使用Air B&B｡之前各种疑虑各种担心,度过在Xavier和Marco家这四天,感觉非常方便非常好,完爆同等价位的酒店｡首先位置很好,离地铁站走路两三分钟,如果像我们一样不介意散散步的,卢浮宫､蓬皮杜､巴黎圣母院､古监狱等一条线走着去都不会太吃力;接着整套房子设施都很完善,洗洗衣服做做饭什么的,旅行也能经济实惠很轻松;虽然我们和Xavier&Marco的作息时间完全不同(几乎没打过照面),但我们遇到问题时,他们真是非常热心地帮忙｡总之,我现在觉得Air B&B还是挺值得一试的,如果再去巴黎,Xavier&Marco家绝对是不二选择｡

Before the various concerns,various worries, spend at Xavier and Marco home this four-day,feel very convenient very good,after the explosion the same price of the hotel. In short,I now think Air B&B was quite worth a try,if you go to Paris,Xavier&Marco home is definitely not home.

column1:
처음으로 Airbnb를 통해 예약을 하고 Sibylle의 Flat에서  나의 가족이 숙박을 하였다.

Sibylle과의 comminication은 매우 빠르고 자세한 설명으로 많은 도움이 되었다. Sibylle의 Flat는 우리 가족 4명이 기거하는데 Paris시내와 인근 지역을 구경하기에 매우 편리한 위치에 있고  안락한 공간과 편의성으로 매우 만족스러웠다.

Sibylle의 Flat는 St. Lazare역 앞에 있어 Paris와 인근지역을 관광하고자 하는 여행객들에게 적극 추천한다.
[오페라 가르니에, 몽마르트, 루브르박물관, 노틀담성당, 개선문, 에펠탑, 생제르망, 베르사이유궁, 지베르니와 주요 백화점(몽즈약국 포함!)을 가장 쉽게 접근할 수 있고 주변에 좋은 식당들과 생필품을 구입할 수 있다(라자르역 지하1층에 까르프매장)]

우연히도 Paris로 떠나기 전날 Airbnb의 한 설립자의 강연을 TV에서 보게 되었고
세계인들의 신뢰를 바탕으로 이러한 Business model을 만든 그들에게 경의를 표하며 좋은 기회를 준데 감사한다.

公寓的位置非常好,离铁塔走路就十分钟｡三条路线的地铁口就在公寓门口,去哪都方便｡公寓周边饮食丰富,有超市,非常的棒｡
主人Jean-Marc 非常热情周到,他的房子比你预想中的好很多,干净的让你惊讶,房间布置的很好,很多细节体现了主人是一个非常有教养,有学问的人｡主人非常爱读书,他有很多书,包括有研究中国古文的书｡第一次来巴黎,很幸运能找到这样的主人的房子,给我的巴黎旅行带来非常难忘的印象｡我们在这里住了一个星期,小孩子们也很开心,说这是我们在巴黎的家｡

column1:
Nous avons eu un weekend absolument parfait chez Lila ! Le appartement est tout que j’ai imaginé ! Très propre, moderne, vraiment équipé, décoré avec un excellent goût, J'aimerais avoir un appartement comme lui ! La localisation est très pratique, la Gare de l’Est est à seulement 2 carrés ! Lila a été très gentille de nous laisser beaucoup de choses pour cuisiner et pour préparer thé, café, etc. pour le petit déjeuneur. Elle nous a aidé avoir un weekend complètement inoubliable ! Je fortement recommande son appartement et je voudrais rester ici à nouveau la prochaine fois que j’aille à Paris !

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

We had an absolutely perfect weekend in Lila's place! The apartment was everything I imagined! Super clean, moderne, really equiped and decorated with an excellent taste! I would love to have an apartment like that one! The location is really practical as the Gare de l'Est is only two blocks away. Lila was really nice to leave us spices and stuff for cooking, and coffee, tea, erc for our breakfast. She helped us have an unforgettable weekend! I stronglu recommend her apartment and I would really stay here the next time I go to Paris! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Realmente tuvimos un fin de semana más que perfecto en el departamento de Lila, Era todo lo que esperaba y más! Super limpio, moderno, realmente equipado y decorado con un gusto excelente. La ubicacion es perfecta ya que la Gare de l'Est (Estación del Este) está a sólo 2 cuadras y desde aquí salen varias líneas de metros con conexiones a todo París. Lila fue super amable y hasta nos dejó condimentos para cocinar y cosas como café, te, etc para prepararnos el desayuno. Ella ayudó muchísimo a que nuestro fin de semana sea perfecto! Realmente recomiendo su departamento porque definitivamente me quedaría aquí de nuevo en mi próxima visita a París!

column1:
房子所处位置很好,在巴黎中心地段,去卢浮宫喝老佛爷购物中心都十几分钟的走路路程,非常好!
周边吃饭的地方和超市很多,很方便!特别是离著名的老牌蜗牛店“金蜗牛”( L'ESCARGOT) 很近,准确地说那条街很多吃饭和喝咖啡的场所,美女帅哥众多,当然附近还有中餐馆!
房间设施齐全,可自己做饭,很方便!
如果说有一点需要改进的是,如果能把房间的床垫平最好!
再次感谢房东提供的房间!谢谢!
column5:
The House location is very good,in the centre of Paris area,to go to the Louvre to drink the Galeries Lafayette shopping centre are ten minutes walk away,very good!
The surrounding places to eat and supermarkets very much,very convenient! Especially from the famous old snail shop“Golden snail”( L'ESCARGOT) is very nearly accurate to say that street a lot to eat and coffee places,beautiful guy,of course, also nearby is a Chinese restaurant!
Room fully furnished,can cook their own meals,very convenient!
If there is little need to improve is,if you can put room mattress flat the best!
Thanks again for the landlord to provide the room! Thank you!

column1:
An amazing flat in the center of Paris, only few minutes away from the St Lazare station and the Lafayette Mall Centers ! The interior design is beautiful, the atmosphere very cozy and the whole flat is very clean.
The nicest surprise was the host though ! Audelin is a very kind, cultivated person, fluent in three languages and who prepares perfect breakfasts !
If you would like to discuss in Russian or read some Russian classics out of Audelin's library, don't miss this place !
PS: We so much enjoyed our stay that we decided to post the comment in three languages :)

Потрясающая квартира в самом центре Парижа,буквально в нескольких шагах от метро Saint Lazare и торгового центра Lafayette!Нас поразил интерьер квартиры и сама атмосфера:вы будете действительно чувствовать себя как дома!К нашему приходу все было подготовлено,чисто и убрано. Audeline также оказался невероятно милым хозяином, очень интеллигентным ,с знанием трех языков,в том числе русского,поэтому мы получили большое удовольствие поговорить с ним на родном языке!Он устроил нам лучший прием,который только можно было ожидать;также дома было все,чтобы сделать с утра вкусный завтрак)Безусловно рекомендуем это место,если вы окажетесь перед выбором поиска жилья в Париже!)
P.S.Нам настолько понравилось проведенное время в этой квартире,что мы решили оставить рекомендации на трех языках!)

C'est un appartement incroyable au centre de Paris, à quelques minutes de la Gare St Lazare et des Grands Magasins. La décoration est magnifique, l'atmosphère très posée et l'appartement entier est très propre.
Toutefois, la plus grande surprise a été l'hôte ! Audelin est quelqu'un de très gentil est cultivé, qui de plus parle trois langues et prépare de super petits-déjeuners !
Si vous souhaitez pratiquer votre Russe ou lire quelques classiques russes dans la bibliothèque d'Audelin, ne manquez pas cet appartement !
PS : Nous avons passé un séjour tellement agréable, que nous avons décidé de poster le commentaire en trois langues :)
column5:
An amazing flat in the center of Paris, only few minutes away from the St Lazare station and the Lafayette Mall Centers ! The interior design is beautiful, the atmosphere very cozy and the whole flat is very clean.
The nicest surprise was the host though ! Audelin is a very kind, cultivated person, fluent in three languages and who prepares breakfasts perfect !
If you would like to discuss in English or read some Russian classics out of Audelin''s library, don't miss this place !
PS: We so much enjoyed our stay that we decided to post the comment in three languages :)

Stunning apartment in the heart of Paris,a few steps from the metro and Saint Lazare shopping center Lafayette!We were amazed by the interior and atmosphere:you will really feel at home!For our arrival everything was prepared,clean and tidy. Audeline was also incredibly nice host, very intelligent ,with a knowledge of three languages,including Russian,so we got a lot of fun to talk to him in your native language!He gave us the best welcome can be expected;also the house had everything to make the morning a delicious Breakfast)Definitely recommend this place if you are faced with the choice of finding accommodation in Paris!)
PS We liked it so much the time spent in this apartment that we decided to leave recommendations in three languages!)

column1:
La case di Leo

Colorata, è casa d’artista. 
Consolatoria. Sicura. Potrebbe dirsi pulita. 
Inserita in un pittoresco Impasse del Marais raggiungibile attraverso quattro piani di scale senza ascensore, un secondo piano con vista sui tetti di chiara atmosfera parigina e condizioni bohèmien.
Il quartiere multiculturale offre vastissima scelta: un croissant nella boulangerie no OGM di Anne Dorval, i famosi porri di Ling Long o la Paris Latina del Diablito. 
Non per leggere non per scrivere le consigliamo!

column1:
La nostra experiència ha estat molt bona. Ens hem sentit molt còmodes. El pis era net i ordenat, molt ben distribuït, tot tal i com sortia publicitat, inclús millor. Érem 4 però no ens hem vist pas mancats d'espai.
Molt bona ubicació, en una zona tranquila, plena de serveis, a només 2 min a peu de l'estació de metro. Tardàvem només uns 15-20 min per anar a la Cité (en ple centre de París).
Voldríem destacar l'amabilitat de l'amfitrió i la seva organització de la nostra estada, amb informacions i consells d'interès per fer més útil la nostra visita a París.
El recomanem plenament a tothom, tant per a parelles com per a famílies amb un o dos fills.
column5:
Our experience has been very good. We felt very comfortable. The apartment was clean and tidy, very well distributed, all as out advertising, even better. We were 4 but we have not seen step lack of space.
Very good location, in a quiet area, full of amenities, just a 2 min walk from the metro station. Tardàvem only about 15-20 min to go to the Cité (in the centre of Paris).
We would like to highlight the friendliness of the host and the organization of our stay, with information and tips of interest to make it more useful to our visit to Paris.
Recommend it fully to everyone, both for couples as for families with one or two children.

column1:
Aurelien ha sido un anfitrión fantástico. Todo perfectamente organizado, tanto a la llegada como a la salida. No hemos podido coincidir con él pero a través del correo electrónico nos ha atendido perfectamente a diario. 
El piso es fantástico, situado en un barrio residencial perfecto para sentirse como en casa. Muy bien comunicado y con todos los servicios necesarios a unos pocos metros. Sin duda repetiremos cuando tengamos ocasión de volver a París!!! Gracias, Aurelien! 
Aurelien ha estat un amfitrió fantástic! Tot molt ben organitzat; una arribada perfecta i una sortida molt relaxada. No hem coincidit amb ell perquè era de viatge però, encara i així, ens ha atès perfectament per e-mail a diari. 
El barri és meravellós i tranquil, perfecte per comprar qualsevol cosa i per passejar amb els nostres dos infants. El metro, al final del carrer, una comunicació perfecta.  
El pis molt còmode i net. El sofà llit és gros, perfecte per dues persones. L'esmorzar del matí a la nostra disposició quan vàrem arribar. No ens ha faltat res, hem estat com a casa.
No dubtarem en tornar-hi si viatjam una altra vegada a aquesta meravellosa ciutat! Moltes gràcies, Aurelien! Salutacions des de Mallorca!
column5:
Aurelien has been on a anfitrión fantasy. Todo whole of organized, tanto a la llegada como to salida. No hemos podido coincide con on but through the correo electrónico us has atendido whole in diario. 
The piso is a fantasy, situated in a suburb residential perfecto para to feel as in home. Muy bien statement y con todos los servicios necesarios to unos, close metros. Sin duda repetiremos cuando tengamos ocasión de volver in Paris!!! Gracias, Aurelien! 
Aurelien has been a host fantastic! All very well organized; an arrival perfect and a departure very relaxed. We have not agreed with him because he was travelling but, still and well, we have given perfectly by e-mail on a daily basis. 
The neighbourhood is wonderful and quiet, the perfect place to buy anything and to walk with our two children. The metro, at the end of the street, a perfect communication. 
The apartment very comfortable and clean. The sofa bed is big, perfect for two people. The breakfast in the morning at our disposal when we arrived. We have not missed anything, we've been at home.
Not dubtarem back there if viatjam again in this wonderful city! Thank you, Aurelien! Greetings from Mallorca!

column1:
L'allotjament és tal com es veu a les fotos. És un apartament petit i acollidor, que té tot allò que necessites per una curta estada a París. Nosaltres hi hem estat amb dos nens de 6 i 8 anys. Potser millor per una parella que per quatre persones però hi hem estat bé. El fet d'haver de pujar 4 pisos no és un problema si els nens són grans com els nostres, a no ser que vagis molt carregat. 
La ubicació és excel·lent està molt ben comunicat i això et fa guanyar  temps en les teves visites per la ciutat. 
La comunicació amb el Marc va ser molt àgil (respon gairebé al moment). Tot un detall que hi hagués suc, llet i cafè per a l'esmorzar del primer dia. En resum, molt bé.
column5:
The accommodation is as seen in the photos. It is an apartment, small and cozy, it has everything you need for a short stay in Paris. We have been with two children of 6 and 8 years old. Maybe best for a couple who for four people but we have been good. The fact of having to climb up 4 floors is not a problem if the children are large as ours, unless you are very loaded. 
The location is excellent it is very well connected and it makes you gain time in your visits to the city. 
The communication with Marc was very responsive (responds almost at the moment). All a detail that there were juice, milk and coffee for breakfast the first day. In summary, very well.

column1:
El nostre viatge a París ha estat fantàstic. L'apartament d'en Jerome era exactament tal i com l'havíem vist a l'anunci i equipat perfectament. Tot estava molt net i endreçat i ens hi vam sentir com a casa.
L'únic detall una mica negatiu és, segons els nostres fills, que al sofà-llit no s'hi dormia gaire bé. En canvi el llit de matrimoni era molt còmode.
El barri té una situació immillorable. És molt cèntric, està a prop del museu Georges Pompidou i Notre Dame es veu des del capdevall del carrer. Hi ha molt ambient, amb sensació de seguretat, sense molèsties de trànsit, ben comunicat i amb botigues, restaurants, bars i supermercats a tocar.
Sense cap mena de dubte tornaríem a llogar aquest apartament i el recomanem a tothom.
column5:
Our trip to Paris has been fantastic. The apartment of Jerome was exactly as we had seen in the ad and fitted perfectly. Everything was very clean and tidy and we there we feel like at home.
The only detail a little negative is, according to our children, that the sofa-bed not slept very well. On the other hand the bed was very comfortable.
The neighborhood has a perfect location. It is very central, is close to museum Georges Pompidou, and Notre Dame cathedral seen from the capdevall of the street. There is a lot of atmosphere, with a feeling of security, without the inconvenience of traffic, well connected and with shops, restaurants, bars and supermarkets close.
Without a shadow of a doubt like we would rent this apartment and recommend it to everyone.

column1:

저는 엄마와 둘이 묵었고 9월 초 꽤 추운 날씨였지만 따뜻한 차를 대접해주시고 환영해주셔서 감사했습니다. 방은 깨끗하고 포근한 방이었고 욕실과 화장실도 매우 깔끔했습니다. 그리고 헤어드라이기를 비롯해서 여러가지 머리를 손질할 수 있는 각종 도구들을 쓸수있어요! 저는 단발이라 드라이기 하나만 썼지만요.
저는 파리에서 주로 버스를 이용했는데, 파리의 주요 관광지로 가는 버스 정류장이 가까이에 있고 지하철 Rue Saint Maur 역과 매우 가깝습니다. Gare Du Nord 역까지 한번에 가는 버스가 지나가서 Eurostar 타러 갈 때도 편리했습니다. 그리고 마지막 날에 버스정류장까지 배웅해주셨어요. 참 감사했습니다!!

It's really close to the underground and the quarter has a Lidl (within easy-walking distance, 5-7'), a very good bakery (opposite the underground) and some restaurants. In addition, the place is really quiet, you won't have to suffer any kind of noise.

최고의 위치, 최고의 호스트! 

무엇보다도, 친절한 호스트 Adriano의 배려 덕분에 편안한 생활을 할 수 있었습니다. 
궁금한 점이 생겨 연락을 시도하면, 바로바로 연락이 되고, 제가 원한다면 직접 찾아와주기도 했습니다. 

숙소 주변에 버스와 메트로 노선도 많고, 
백화점(printemps, galeries lafayette)과 여러 쇼핑 스팟(saint honore, madelein etc.)이 도보 가능 거리에 있습니다. 

Palais Garnier 도 천천히 걸어서 5분안에 갈 수 있는데, 즉 이말은, 공항에서 직행으로 오는 roissy bus 정류장도 가깝다는 얘기....
저도 여자 둘이 여행왔는데, 굳이 택시를 타지 않고도 편하게 숙소에 도착할수 있었습니다. 

rer A, Auber 역도 3분거리에 있어서 아울렛(라발레 빌리지) 갈때도 굳이 리무진 버스티켓을 끊지 않고 자유롭게 다녀왔습니다. 

참고로, 
저는 천천히 걷는 스타일이라 도보 시간은 보통 속도나 빠르게 걷는 다면 단축 시킬수 있습니다. 

숙소 컨디션도 깔끔하고, 엘리베이터 시설도 신식이라 편리했습니다. 

다시 파리를 방문할 때, 꼭 다시 묵고 싶은 숙소입니다.

Les fotos són tal i com és l'apartament, ajuda molt que hi hagi el plano de l'apartament, et pots fer una idea real abans d'anar.
Extraordinàriament ben situat a la vora de moltes botigues de tot, de restaurants de tota classe, també a la vora del metro, al costat mateix de la Torre Eiffel. 
L'apartament te de tot, no hi falta de res. Molt net.
El preu està molt bé per la situació.
Pots caminar tranquil.lament pel barri, és tranquil i el carrer ho és molt, no hi ha gens de soroll, els veins tampoc no en fan, es pot descansar.
L'amfitrió molt amable, vam arribar amb molt de retard el vol i ens va esperar per donar-nos les claus. Ens va deixar una guia de París i mapes.

column1:
Español / Spanish/ Espagnol:
Laurent es un gran anfitrión, muy simpático y atento, habla perfectamente tanto inglés como francés. Nos vino a recoger a la parada del metro y nos explicó todo lo referente al apartamento. El apartamento está EXCELENTEMENTE UBICADO, a sólo 2 minutos andando del Panteón y a 5 minutos de Notre Dame, en una calle tranquila y muy próxima a la parada de metro. Se trata de un apartamento pequeño, pero muy bien aprovechado. El sofá-cama es cómodo, el microondas y la vitro funcionan perfectamente, y la ducha está muy bien, si bien el baño es algo pequeño. La ventana da a un patio interior, por lo que apenas hay ruido. Además, Laurent nos dejó su ordenador portátil para acceder a Internet, y nos permitió gratuitamente realizar llamadas de teléfono ilimitadas a España (siempre que fuera un número fijo). En definitiva, la estancia fue inmejorable, pues el precio del apartamento es muy asequible para la zona tan céntrica en que se encuentra, está muy bien equipado y Laurent es una persona muy amable, simpática y que en todo momento trata de ayudarte y facilitarte las cosas. Sin duda, lo recomiendo a todos. Si alguna vez vuelvo a París, repetiré en este estudio tan céntrico y acogedor.

Francés / French/ Français:
The apartment is excellently located (two minutes Pantheon, five minutes Notre Dame). The apartment is small but it has everything you need. The sofa bed is comfortable, the shower, the bathroom, the kitchen, the microwave… work very well. The street is quiet and you can sleep without noise. Laurent is a very kind and friendly person.  He left us free his notebook computer to access Internet and make phone calls to Spain. Laurent speaks fluently English and French and he always try to solve your doubts. In conclusion, the stay was perfect and I recommend this apartment to everyone.

Inglés /English/ Anglais:
L’appartement est très bien situé (deux minutes Panthéon, cinq minutes Notre Dame). L’appartement es petit, mais il a tout ce dont vous avez besoin. Le canapé-lit est confortable, la douche, la salle de bains, le micro-ondes…fontcionnent très bien. La rue est tranquile donc tu peux dormir sans bruit. Laurent  est un person sympathique et amical. Il nous a laissé utiliser son ordinateur portable pour surfer sur Internet et nous avons pu telephone gratuitement à l’Espagne. Laurent parle très bien le français et l’anglais et il résout tojours vos doutes. En résumé, le séjour a été parfait. Je recommande cet appartement à tout le monde.
column5:
English / Spanish/ Espagnol:
Laurent is a great host, very friendly and attentive, speaks perfect English and French. We came to pick up the metro stop and explained to us everything about the apartment. The apartment is EXCELLENTLY LOCATED, just 2 minutes walk from the Pantheon and 5 minutes from Notre Dame, on a quiet street and very close to the metro stop. It is a small apartment, but very well taken advantage of. The sofa bed is comfortable, the microwave and vitro work perfectly, and the shower is very good, although the bathroom is somewhat small. The window overlooks a courtyard, there is hardly any noise. In addition, Laurent has left us his laptop to access the Internet, and allowed us to freely make phone calls unlimited to Spain (always a fixed number). In short, the stay was superb, as the price of the apartment is very affordable for the area very central in which it is located, is very well equipped and Laurent is a very kind person, friendly and at all times tries to help you and make things easier. Without a doubt, recommend it to all. If I'm ever back in Paris, I will repeat in this study as it is central and cozy.

French / French/ Français:
The apartment is excellently located (two minutes Pantheon, five minutes to Notre Dame). The apartment is small but it has everything you need. The sofa bed is comfortable, the shower, the bathroom, the kitchen, the microwave... work very well. The street is quiet and you can sleep without noise. Laurent is a very kind and friendly person. I left us free his notebook computer to access Internet and make phone calls to Spain. Laurent speaks fluently English and French and I always try to solve your doubts. In conclusion, the stay was perfect and I recommend this apartment to everyone.

English /English/ Anglais:
L appartement is very well situated when it is (deux minutes Panthéon, cinq minutes as Notre Dame). L appartement is petit, mais il a tout ce dont vous avez besoin. Le canapé-lit est confortable, douche, salle de bains, le micro-ondes...fontcionnent very well. La rue est tranquile donc tu peux sleep sans bruit. Laurent is a person sympathique, et amical. Il nous a laissé'utiliser are'ordinateur portable pour surfer sur Internet et nous avons pu telephone samsung à l'espagne. Laurent parle très bien le français et l'anglais et il résout tojours vos doutes. In résumé, le séjour a été parfait. Je recommande cet appartement à tout le monde.

column1: 感谢Monsieur Gérald 和 Madame Myriam的盛情招待,浪漫的国度,浪漫的夫妇｡让我们度过了两个美好的船屋之夜,不仅给我们做了早餐,有一天我们回来晚了,有点饿了,想出去吃夜宵,他们特意下厨,邀请我们共进烛光夜宵｡聊的也很开心,从巴黎聊到北京,从生活聊到工作,从政治聊到经济｡船屋很大,客厅超舒适,船很稳,很少会晃动｡最后我们还互留了联系方式,欢迎Monsieur Gérald 和 Madame Myriam有空到中国北京,我会热情招待｡总之,非常感谢!Merci beaucoup!

The boat house is large,living room is super comfortable,the boat is very stable,very little shake area. En la part negativa, una neteja superficial, unes mides molt reduïdes que quedaven agreujades pel sofà llit massa voluminós i poc funcional, sobra el piano quan falta espai. Especialment hi ha el problema del wàter separat del lavabo que és petit, sorollós, poc ventilat i molt indiscret.

Ludmila & Olivier 熱情好客,幫助了我們好多,介紹給我們一些有用的資訊,及領我們走了一趟附近的小店,公寓位於一個寧靜安全的小區,現代式有電梯的公寓(對家裡的老人家是一大好處),房間足夠四人居住,有一個寬敞的陽台,一個大冰箱,齊全的廚房,出門就到達地鐵站12號及4號綫,超級市場就近在咫尺,一切應有盡有,絕對方便舒適

Mandy
column5:
Ludmila & Olivier hospitality,helped us a lot,introduce to us some useful information,and a collar and we took a trip to the nearby shops,the apartment is located in a quiet safe cell,modern style with an Elevator the apartment(home for the elderly is a major benefit),room enough for four people live,there is a spacious balcony,a large refrigerator,equipped kitchen,go out on to reach the subway station No. 12 and the No. 4 line,supermarket close by,everything everything,absolutely convenient and comfortable

Mandy

column5: The attention of phillipe was spectacular. Our arrival was late and took the time to wait, to explain, and is more to give you a few pointers. The department is small (as most in paris) but very comfortable, quiet and very well located.

column1: Nathalie这间位于玛莱区的公寓,是我这次巴黎最美好的回忆所在,温馨舒适,没有任何违和感｡Nathalie非常周到耐心,虽然没有见面,但是邮件､电话､短信沟通都非常好｡地理位置超完美,它基本就是在巴士底､蓬皮杜和孚日广场的中心｡楼下就有一间我特别喜欢的设计师品牌店,往蓬皮杜方向,步行三五分钟,JO MALONE､Acqua di Parma､ Diptyque以及法国本土设计师品牌集合店､饰品店,应有尽有｡距离Saint paul地铁站也非常近,街角的Miss manon咖啡店有超好吃的西梅挞和外带沙拉,还有其他各种餐馆,比如说公寓旁边就是一家pasta店,然后是海鲜店､American food,包括一家中式快餐店,虽然是台湾人开的,但是也ok啦｡只有一个小小的遗憾,那就是咖啡机坏了:( 总之,下一次巴黎,还会住这儿!
column5: Nathalie, this room is located in the Marais area of the apartment,is with me this time in Paris the most wonderful memories,warm and comfortable,without any sense of violation as well. Nathalie is very attentive patience,although not meet,but the message, and the telephone and SMS communication are very good as well. Location super perfect,it is in the Bastille, and the Pompidou and Place des Vosges in the center of the room. Downstairs there is a guest I particularly like the designer brand shop,to the Pompidou direction,walking a few minutes,JO MALONE and Acqua di Parma And Diptyque, as well as native French designer brand collection of shops, and jewelry shops,everything available. Distance from Saint paul metro station is also very near,on the corner of Miss manon cafe with super tasty prunes tart and Packed a salad,there are various other restaurants,such as the apartment is right next to a pasta shop,and then seafood, and American food,including a Chinese fast food restaurant,although the Taiwan people,but also ok as well. Only one small regret,and that is the coffee machine is broken:( anyway,next time in Paris,stay here!

column1: L'apartament és exactament tal i com apareix a les fotos, petit i acollidor. Té els serveis bàsics que es necessiten per passar uns dies a París: calefacció, un fogonet elèctric, lavabo dins l'apartament, microones, mini nevera i wifi. L'ubicació és excel.lent, en un barri molt cèntric i ple de bars, restaurants i botigues. S'agraeix poder anar a peu a algun dels llocs més turístics que queden a la vora, i sinó, té vàries línies de metro amb parada molt a prop. Perfecte per viatgers tots sols o en parella. Ronald va estar pendent del (Hidden by Airbnb) i responent ràpid a qualsevol consulta. Recomanació total.
column5: The apartment is exactly as shown in the pictures, small and cosy. It has the basic services that they need to spend a few days in Paris: heating, a stove kettle, bathroom within the apartment, microwave, mini-fridge and wifi. The location is excellent.slow, in a district very central and full of bars, restaurants and shops. Is grateful to be able to walk to some of the places more tourist that are on the edge, and but, has several subway lines with stops very close by. Perfect for travellers alone or in couple. Ronald was pending in the (Hidden by Airbnb) and responding quickly to any queries. Recommendation the total.

column1:
El apartamento de Jean-Mitchell está en buenas condiciones, pero es mejorable el equipamiento. Por el precio que pagas por el apartamento debería tener, al menos, utensilios de baño como gel o champú que no se pueden llevar en el avión. Los utensilios de cocina también son mejorables.
Lo mejor del piso es la ubicación, a 5 minutos a pie del Trocadero. Además, JeanMitchell estuvo muy atento a nuestra llegada. 
Buen sitio para quedarse en París.
column5:
The apartment of Jean-Mitchell is in good conditions, but it is upgradeable to the equipment. For the price you pay for the apartment should have, at least, kitchenware shower gel or shampoo that you cannot bring on the plane. The kitchen utensils are also upgradeable.
The best thing of the apartment is the location, 5 minutes walk from the Trocadero. In addition, JeanMitchell was very attentive to our arrival. 
Good place to stay in Paris.

column1: Manu 是一个非常好的主人,响应及时,无论是平时沟通或者是到达后联系,都是第一时间给我回复｡我因为飞机改期计划提前一天到达,又因为大雨提前的航班没有赶上,Manu都贴心的让我改了退退了改｡这里有非常灵活的入住和退房时间,只要你提前告诉他来安排｡Manu的家就在地铁jussieu站上面,七号线和十号线交汇处,下楼就可以乘坐地铁,卢浮宫五站,圣母院步行15分钟,大学对面,非常安全｡家里物品一应俱全,做饭的餐具调料,洗澡洗衣用品,分布四周的转换插头,所有你能想到的,Manu都为你考虑到了｡我和孩子在这里住了八天,用脚丈量了巴黎的博物馆､市集､教堂,留了了非常美好的印象｡如果说有什么不足的地方,就是房子在地铁上面,睡眠浅的人可能会嫌吵闹,但是我和孩子不会,每天都睡得非常香甜｡非常感谢Manu,希望有一天重返巴黎还能住到Manu的家!

column1:
El apartamento de Jean-Philippe está genial. Muy limpio. Cama muy cómoda. Nos atendió para darnos las llaves y explicarnos dónde comer y beber por la zona. Las vistas son fantásticas. El barrio es agradable con muchos restaurantes y bares. Se puede ir andando a cualquier sitio interesante de París y está a dos paradas en metro de la Gare du Nord. Si puedo, volveré a este apartamento y se lo recomendaré a mis amigos. Nos sentimos como en casa.

Jean-Philippe's apartment is great. Very clean. Confortable bed. Check in was perfect, he gave us a few recommendations for restaurants and bars nearby. You can walk to most of the best attractions in Paris. 2 undergorund stops from Gare du Nord. I would recommend it to my friends and I would definitely  stay at JP's next time I visit Paris. We felt like at home

If I can, I will return to this apartment and will recommend to my friends. We felt like at home.

column1: Hem estat en aquest apartament una família de quatre membres (dos adults i dos adolescents). Havíem contractat un altre apartament just al carrer de darrere i unes hores abans d'arribar a París ens van comunicar que ens ens l'havien de canviar però el canvi va ser a millor ja que aquest apartament tenia una habitació més que el que nosaltres havíem contractat inicialment. La decoració és molt original i la neteja perfecta. L'apartament no té finestres, però entra molta llum i s'està molt agust. Un apartament molt nou i molt espaiós. Els banys molt nous i la neteja perfecta.  Els llits eren fantàstics, amb uns matalassos de molta qualitat. No s'escoltava cap soroll, perquè està en un pati intern, així que hem descansat molt agust. Ens ha encantat.
column5: We've been in this apartment for a family of four members (two adults and two teenagers). We had hired another apartment just on the street behind and a few hours before arriving in Paris we were to communicate that to us we had to change but the change was for the better since this apartment had one bedroom more than what we had initially hired. The decor is very original and the cleaning perfect. The apartment has no windows but gets plenty of light and is very agust. A apartment very new and very spacious. The bathrooms are very new and the cleanliness perfect. The beds were fantastic, with a few mattresses of great quality. Not be heard any noise, because it is in a courtyard internal, so we rested very agust. We have been delighted.

column1:
Pranfrix 수퍼마켓 바로 옆에 위치한 근사한 아파트입니다. 4인 가족(8살 4살)이 지내기에 모자람이 없는 완벽한 곳입니다. 부엌으로 보이는 에펠타워 뷰도 좋고 베란다도 볕이 너무 좋고 그리고 말 그대로 거의 모든 것이 구비되어 있습니다. 3월말에 왔었는데 너무 아늑하고 추운줄 모르고 잘 지냈습니다. 게다가 동네는 프랑스 시민혁명과도 아주 깊은 관련이 있는 곳이어서 역사적으로도 의미가 있는 곳이었습니다. 호스트 David은 너무 친절하고 인상이 좋았습니다.

Nation역에서 걸어서 6-8분 거리입니다. 반대방향으로가면 8호선 역이 6분 거리에 있습니다. 어디든 갈 수 있습니다.(에펠탑 8호선. 몽마르트 언덕 2호선)
바로 옆 건물에 수퍼마켓이 있고 다음 블럭에 까르푸시티가 있습니다. 근처에 맛있는 빵집과 고기파는 곳이 있고 와인가게도 있습니다.   카페와 바는 주변에 널렸습니다. David이 추천해준 동네 레스토랑도 정말 좋았습니다. 

주차
혹시나 수동운전이 가능하시고 2명이서 작은차를 빌려서 올 수있다면 퍼펙트입니다. 아파트 지하에 주차장이 있어서 매우 안전하게 차를 보관할수있습니다. 저의 경우 캐리어가 큰게 두개나 있고 그외 캐빈 캐리어랑 배낭들이 있어서 투싼을 빌려서 왔는데 진입로 폭이 좁아서 주차가 조금 힘들었습니다. 사흘 묵으면서 귀찮은 마음에 그냥 지하철로 다니고 마지막날 차를 빼서 반납했습니다. 작은 차라면 주차가 별로 어렵지 않을 것입니다.

침대하나와 침대로 변신가능한 소파가 있습니다. 어른 두명에 아이 두명이면 충분한 사이즈입니다. 어른 4명이면 좁을 곳 같네요.

아파트가 조용한 동네에 위치하고 있어서 밤에도 전혀 위험하지 않고 소음같은 것도 없습니다. 아파트에 들어갈때나 주차장에 들어갈때 엘리베이터를 탈때 전자식 키를 대고 들어가므로 절대적으로 안전하게 느껴집니다. 

다음에도 파리에 오면 여기를 올려고 합니다. 사흘 있었지만 너무 편하고 익숙해져서 좋았습니다.

column1: Antoine 的公寓走路到捷運站3分鐘,直達戴高樂機場的火車站約5分鐘,我帶著25公斤的行李箱沒有什麼困難｡房子是百年公寓的一樓,房東整理的很乾淨,尤其是浴室是重新裝修的,很明亮而且乾溼分離｡跟房東同住但房東都在樓上除了早餐時間之外不會有交集,公寓旁有超市,路口有家樂福､麥當勞､Bouygues電信可以買4G sim卡,晚上11點因爲路口的餐廳都還在營業不會感覺到荒涼｡要離開時剛好遇到法國鐵路罷工而選擇坐客運去機場,房東很熱心的帶我走到附近的 Montparnasse 車站坐車,其實很近,走路約15分鐘｡附近都是維護良好而且美麗的老建築,是個值得每天悠閒佇足的地方｡

column1: En relació qualitat-preu és un molt bon apartament. Està en una zona residencial tranquila i aprop té farmàcia, supermercats, bars i restaurants. A menys de 5 minuts està la parada de metro de Les Gobelines que et comunica amb el centre (tenint en compte que tot a París està lluny) i  caminant a uns 20 minuts tens els jardins de Luxemburg, les catacombes de París i el Jardin des Plantes.
column5: In relation quality-price is a very good apartment. It is in a residential area quiet and close to has pharmacy, supermarkets, bars and restaurants. In less than 5 minutes away is the metro stop of The Gobelines you to communicate with the centre (bearing in mind that everything in Paris is far away) and walking about a 20 minute walk are the gardens of Luxembourg, the catacombes of Paris and the Jardin des Plantes.

column1:
[EN] --- Everything on our stay was perfect, it was a tiny slice of parisian life. The studio is on a calm street, the nearest metro station is 2 blocks away and there is a Monoprix just around the corner. The lady that helps Mr. Hubert, Rosa, speaks portuguese and is a very nice person. She even helped us arrange a taxi on our departure. We highly recommend the studio for everyone.

[FR] --- Tout sur notre séjour a été parfait, il était une petite tranche de vie parisienne. Le studio est dans une rue calme, la station de métro la plus proche est à 2 pâtés de maisons et il ya un Monoprix juste autour du coin. La dame qui aide M. Hubert, Rosa, parle portugais et est une personne très agréable. Elle a même aidé à organiser un taxi lors de notre départ. Nous recommandons fortement le studio pour tout le monde.

[PT] --- Tudo em nossa estada foi perfeito - literalmente um pedacinho da vida parisiense. O estúdio é em uma rua calma, a estação mais próxima de metrô fica a 2 quadras e tem um Monoprix dobrando a esquina. A moça que ajuda o Sr. Hubert, Rosa, fala português e é muito simpática. Ela inclusive nos ajudou a solicitar um taxi para nossa partida. Recomendamos o estúdio para todas as pessoas!
column5:
[IN] --- Everything on our stay was perfect, it was a tiny slice of parisian life. The studio is on a calm street, the nearest metro station is 2 blocks away and there is a Monoprix just around the corner. The lady that helps Mr. Hubert, Rosa, speaks portuguese and is a very nice person. She even helped us arrange a taxi on our departure. We highly recommend the studio for everyone.

[EN] --- Everything about our stay was perfect, it was a little slice of parisian life. The studio is in a quiet street, the metro station, the nearest is 2 blocks away and there is a Monoprix just around the corner. The lady who assists Mr. Hubert, Rosa, speaks Portuguese, and is a very pleasant person. She even helped arrange a taxi upon our departure. We highly recommend the studio for everyone.

O estúdio e em uma rua calma, a estação but próxima de metrô fica a 2 quadras e tem um Monoprix dobrando a esquina. A moça that ajuda o Sr. Hubert, Rosa, fala português e é muito simpática. Ela inclusive our ajudou a solicitar um taxi para nossa partida. Recomendamos o estúdio para todas as pessoas!

column1: Pis amb bona imatge però amb falta de neteja important (sobretot a la cuina!). Vam contactar amb Airbnb i amb l'amfitriona pels problemes de neteja i perque no hi havia tapa al water i el penúltim dia de l'estada, després de moltes converses, va vindre la mare de la Cyndra (perque ella estava de viatje) a netejar. El llit era còmode. El pis era diferent del que apareix a les fotos, els mobles casi els mateixos, però estava bé, l'únic que per accedir al altell hi havia unes escales força complicades de baixar (molt verticals i els graons molt estrets). El wifi i la tele no funcionaven. Faltava neteja en general i pot ser una funda pel sofa i la butaca ja que estaven amb taques. La meva parella i jo no repetiriem si ens trobéssim les mateixes condicions de ordre i neteja!
column5: Floor with a good image but with a lack of important cleaning (especially the kitchen!). We contacted Airbnb and the host by the problems of cleaning and because there was no lid to the toilet and on the last day of the stay, after many conversations, was to come the mother of the Cyndra (because she was of the trip) to clean. The bed was comfortable. The floor was different from what appears in the photos, the furniture is almost the same, but it was ok, the only access to the attic there were some stairs quite complicated to download (very vertical and the steps very narrow). The wifi and tv were not working. Was clean in general and can be a cover for the sofa and the armchair as it were with spots. My partner and I don't repetiriem if we were the same conditions of order and cleanliness!

column1:
Marc的船屋给了我们非常特别的体验｡在塞纳河上的巴黎船上度过了非常愉快的三天｡Marc非常热情,很耐心接待我们并且再已过了退房时间还允许我们存放行李｡屋内一切设施都很齐全,热水和电器也非常现代化｡
值得注意的是如果你晕船请不要选择船屋,即使拴在岸边也会很晃｡
有一点是,你只能在甲板上欣赏夜景,船屋内的橱窗看不到外面且并不是靠外而且还有一艘船挡在外面｡
总之,这是一趟非常愉快的旅行｡

El barri és tranquil i la casa està a un minut a peu de l’estació de metro (a deu de la torre Eiffel). L’atenció de na Maria i la casa en sí no tenen preu. Tornaríem sense dubtar-ho.

column1:
Umm...作为住的最长时间的人,我有太多想说的了呢｡预定之后Jeanne很快就发很具体的交通方式,还问我早上喝什么｡虽然我说喝热开水之后她就无语了哈哈哈哈哈｡到了住处之后先是Carine一个人在家等我,是17岁的青春少女呢哈哈*v*...之后不久Nico回来啦,是Carine的哥哥,他是厨师呢,大胡子暖男,眼神超美-v-｡然后我就粘着他跟他去买晚饭的菜｡大概八九点Jeanne就回来啦,她超级热情的,总是笑着｡于是我的第一餐paris晚饭就在尝了Nico大厨的手艺啊,四个人在小阳台上就这蜡烛和一闪一闪的电灯,饮小酒,温暖｡像大多数巴黎女人一样这家也抽烟哦,不过都在户外阳台上｡
我买手机卡､换汇啊什么的,他们都会尽力帮我｡反正每天Jeanne都会问我打算干嘛呀,回来会问我过得好不好｡后来熟悉了之后Nicolas还和我一起出去玩-v-,当然不是每个人他都会陪你出去玩的~ 后来他去阿根廷了,我好伤心咧｡
实话说我也常常拿他们家面包水果吃,然后Nico做饭的时候我会偷一点来吃,哈哈,反正你们拿之前要问问人家就好啦｡然后用了碗筷当然要收拾好咯｡
房东家好像会说英语法语德语(西班牙语?)等等,酷酷的,他们家房子算是这小小巴黎比较大的了呢,而且有电梯,位置也很好｡房子里面的卫生在家庭里也算是很好的,每周有钟点工打扫｡但是没来过巴黎的人要对巴黎公共区域的卫生状况有心理准备哦,巴黎就是臭臭脏脏乱乱的巴黎,但是巴黎是非常有机的城市,应当要用心的发掘进去,生活过一周便能开始发现她的美,而不是一带而过｡
Above all thank you Jeanne, Carine & Nicolas. Love you all =), xoxo.  Merci Beaucoup !

Encantados de haber pasado cinco días en el apartamento de Olaniyi. El apartamento es justo como se ve en las fotos. Sin sorpresas. Una habitación con cama de 135, un salón con sofá cama -a mi me resultó cómodo-, un baño y una cocina. A unos 25 minutos andando de la Torre Eiffel -nosotros íbamos con nuestra hija en su carrito- y a cinco minutos de la estación de metro de Vaugirard. Limpio y tranquilo. Olaniyi muy atenta, te responde con prontitud y buena disponibilidad. Lo recomiendo y sin duda repetiría.

Il est à 25 minutes à pied de la Tour Eiffel -nous l'avons fait avec poussette- et 5 minutes à pied de la gare de Vaugirard. Propre et calme. column1:
L'apartament era tal com surt a les fotos. Ampli, amb molta llum i net. Està situat en un barri tranquil, molt a prop del metro St. Ambroise i amb un supermercat a 50m. Els llits, éren molt còmodes.
Els electrodomèstics, de qualitat. Fins i tot una rentadora i assecadora (a l'exterior, per compartir amb els altres 3 apartaments).
Érem 10 persones i hi hem estat molt a gust. Si haguéssim de tornar a Paris, repetiriem segur. 
Ens va sorprendre l'entrada a l'edifici, una mica fosca i antiga, però quan passes una segona porta, ja et trobes el què surt a les fotos.
column5:
The apartment was just as you see it in the photos. Spacious, with great light and clean. It is located in a quiet neighborhood, very close to the metro St. Ambroise and with a supermarket at 50m. The beds, éren very comfortable.
The appliances, of quality. Even a washing machine and dryer (on the outside, to share with other 3 apartments).
We were 10 people and we have been very happy. If we were to return to Paris, repetiriem sure. 
We were surprised at the entry to the building, a bit dark and old, but when you hover a second door, and you find what comes out in the photos.

column1:

El wifi funciona molt bé a tota la casa.

No estava prou net, nosaltres varem fregar el terra, netejar cuina i banys en arribar.
column5:

column1:
L’estança ha sigut immillorable, Paulo és un gran amfitrió i ha respòs sempre a tots els dubtes. L’ estudi és tal i com es descriu al perfil: és molt acollidor, pràctic i té tot el necessari per passar el temps que sigui a París confortablement. El barri és molt bonic: l’estudi està just darrera el Sacre Coeur, en una zona poc turística i amb molt encant; està al costat d’un carrer ple de boulangeries, cafès i supermercats oberts fins tard. Sense dubte, quan torni a París, tornaré a aquest estudi!
Gràcies Paulo per fer-ho tot tant fàcil!
column5:
The stay has been excellent, Paulo is a great host and has responded always all questions. The studio is as described in the profile: it is very cozy, practical and has everything you need to spend the time that is in Paris comfortably. The neighborhood is very nice: the studio is right behind the Sacre Coeur, in a quiet, un-touristy and with a lot of charm; it is next to a street full of boulangeries, cafes and supermarkets open until late. Without a doubt, when you return to Paris, I will return to this studio!
Thanks Paulo for making it all so easy!

column1:
Marie와 Eric의 집은 출장을 위해 파리에 온 사람들에게 어울리는 집이라고 생각합니다. 장기여행 중이어서 짐도 꽤 있었고 조용히 푹 쉬기에는 여유공간이 적고 휴지통도 화장실에만 있어서 조금 불편했습니다.
 하지만 깔끔하고 무엇보다 Eric이 굉장히 친절하고 인상깊은 호스트였습니다. 요구사항도 즉시 반영해주었고, 필요한게 무엇인지 많이 신경써주더군요.
 아파트도 대로변에 있고 바로 앞에 쇼핑몰, 마트, 레스토랑, 빵집이 있어서 참 좋았습니다. 하지만 방이 좁다보니 문을 열자마자 침대가 보이는데 옆집 사람이 외출한다고 나오다가 저희의 공간을 훤히 볼 수 있어서 조금 아쉬웠습니다.
 세느강 바로 근처이긴 하지만 저층이라 거의 보이지 않고 쇼핑몰과 노보텔이 주된 뷰를 차지했습니다. 
 파리의 낭만을 느끼기보다는 단기 출장을 위해 파리를 방문한 분들에게 추천드립니다. 감사합니다 :)

column1:
Nos recibió un amigo de Sarah, aunque tuvimos algún problema en la comunicación, por el idioma principalmente, pero entramos al apartamento a la hora acordada.
El apartamento es pequeñito, en la foto parece más grande pero es muy acogedor, para tres personas fue fantástico. 
La conexión Wifi es muy buena. 
El barrio tiene muchas tiendas, supermercados y el metro está situado a pocos metros. Repetiría sin dudarlo. 

Un ami de Sarah nous a accuelli. Nous avons eu un problème de communication á cause de la langue, mais nous sommes arrivé à l'appartement à l'heure convenu. 
L'appartement est petit, il paraît plus grand dans les images mais il était charmant pour trois personnes. 
La conexión Wifi était trés bonne.
Le quartier a beaucoup des supermarchés et magasins et le métro est situé à quelques mètres. Je vous recommande cet appartement!

The neighborhood has many shops, supermarkets and the metro is situated a few meters. I would repeat without hesitation.

A place highly recommended to spend a few days in Paris.

column1:
La casa del William és perfecte per passar uns dies a París, amb l'únic inconvenient que és un cinquè pis sense ascensor. Si es porten maletes pesades o no s'està físicament en plenes condicions no és una opció recomanable. 
A banda, d'això, l'estança és bonica, com es veu a la foto, i té tot el què es pugui necessitar. El William, a més, ofereix la nevera i el rebost i es pot utilitzar tot el què es vulgui de manera gratuïta.
La situació seria magnífica si no fos perquè l'estació de metro de Chateau Rouge estava tancada per obres, cosa que obligava a un petit passeig de 7 minuts.
L'ambient del barri no és molt agradable però només tombar a la cantonada i pujar cap a Montmartre la cosa canvia completament, i es pot gaudir de seguida de l'encant de la zona més romàntica de París.
column5:
The house of William is the perfect place to spend a few days in Paris, with the only downside that it is a fifth floor without elevator. If you carry suitcases heavy or not it is physically in the best conditions is not an option recommended. 
In addition to this, the room is beautiful, as you see in the photo, and has everything what you may need. William, in addition, offers the refrigerator and the pantry and you can use everything what you want, free of charge.
The situation would be superb if it were not for the metro station (Chateau Rouge) was closed for renovation, which required a short walk of 7 minutes.
The atmosphere of the neighbourhood is not very pleasant, but just turn the corner and climb up towards Montmartre and the thing changes completely, and you can enjoy immediately the charm of the area most romantic of Paris.

column1:
지하철역이 매우 가까웠습니다. 도보 2분 거리 안에 2개가 위치합니다. 
따라서 관광을 위한 교통이 매우 편리했습니다. 
Flat은 1층에 위치하며 입구에서 아래로 내려가는 계단이 있기는 하나 이용에 큰 불편함은 없습니다. (지하 아닙니다. 입구는 내려가지만 창문 쪽은 2층에 해당됩니다.)
Flat 근처에 수퍼마켓 및 빵집들, 카페들, 레스토랑들, 잡화가게, 옷가게들 등 거리자체가 이미 훌륭한 관광지입니다. 활기차고 아름다운 골목들이 가득합니다. 
그럼에도 Flat으로 들어서면 놀라울 정도로 조용합니다. 
Flat은 매우 깨끗하고 넓고 따뜻하며 아늑하고 또한 매우 우아하게 인테리어되어있습니다. 
샤워실 및 침구도 매우 편안했으며 저희 3인 가족에게 완벽했습니다, 
Ann과 만나지는 못했으나 연락에 아무 문제가 없었고 모든 게 스무즈하고 또한 매우 친절했습니다. 우리는 그녀의 아들 Timothee에게 매우 환영받았고 다양한 주방도구 및 세탁기, 청소기 등 내부의 편의시설 또한 8박의 긴 체류에 매우 도움이 되었습니다. 
부모님도 매우 좋아하셨습니다. 파리에 다시 방문한다면 꼭 다시 오고 싶은 곳 입니다. 매우 추천합니다.
column5:
The metro station is very close. Walk 2 minutes in the 2 position. 
Therefore, for tourist transportation is very convenient. 
The Flat is on the 1st floor, located at the entrance going down the stairs to the one used in the large discomfort. (The basement is not. The entrance is down but the window side is on the 2nd floor.)
The Flat is near a supermarket and a bakery, cafes, restaurants, sundries shop, clothes shop etc the street itself is already a great tourist destination. Vibrant and beautiful alleys. 
Even so, Flat with in a surprisingly quiet. 
The Flat is spacious and very clean and warm and cozy and also very elegant interior. 
Shower and bedding was very comfortable and our 3 families was perfect. 
Ann and only one did not, but the contact had no issues and all twenty series and also was very friendly. We have her son Timothee very welcome and did a variety of kitchen tools and washing machine, cleaner etc inside the facilities or for the 8 nights of a long stay in was very helpful. 
Parents are also very good...... Paris back to visit if I want to come back is the perfect choice. Highly recommended.

column1:
엄마와 함께 방문했는데,너무 좋았어요.
우선 위치가 좋아요.
가까운 지하철역이 많은데, 제일 가까운역은 걸어서 3분, 다른 역들도 걸어서 5~7분 사이면 가고, 오페라역도 5분정도 걸어가면 있어요.
두번째로 주변에 마트가 많아서 장보기 좋고, 한인슈퍼도 있어요. 한식, 중식, 일식집도 많고, 레스토랑이나 펍도 많아서 음식 걱정 안해도 되요.
세번째. 집도 깨끗하고 필요한 도구도 다 있어서 생활하는데 편했어요. 
무엇보다 아파트 앞에 도어락이 있어서 다른사람은 들어올수 없어서 안전해요.
그리고 Elodie와 우릴 마중왔던 Elodie 친구도 너무 친절했어요. 짐도 들어주고 집 설명도 친절하게 해줬어요. 그리고 마지막 가는날 비행기 시간때문에 일찍 체크아웃했는데 나와줘서 가는길도 설명해줬구요. 첫 에어비앤비여서 걱정 많이했었는데 걱정할 필요가 없는 집이였어요.
무엇보다 엄마가 맘에 들어하셔서 저도 좋았구요:)
다음번에 파리갈때에도 Elodie의 아파트를 빌릴거에요.

column1: Yves ha sigut molt amable, tot i que si no saps parlar francés costa una mica comunicar-te amb ell. No obstant, quan vam demanar un lloc per deixar les maletes l'últim dia va fer tot el possible per ajudar-nos malgrat ja li vinguessin els següents hostes. El millor d'aquest apartment, sense cap mena de dubte, és l'ubicació. El carrer és molt tranquil, aprop de supermercats i boulangeries, i sobretot, a tocar del Sena i Notre Dame. La neteja i l'espai deixa a desitjar, però ja t'avisa dels metres quadrats que té. Per a dues persones és més que suficient per dormir, però molt justet per menjar-hi i fer-hi vida. En general, l'experiència ha sigut satisfactòria.
column5: Yves has been very friendly, although if you don't know speak French it is somewhat difficult to communicate with him. However, when we ask for a place to leave your luggage the last day he did everything possible to help us in spite of it already came the following houses. The best of this apartment, without any doubt, is the location. The street is very quiet, close to supermarkets and boulangeries, and above all, near the Seine and Notre Dame cathedral. The cleanliness and the space it leaves to be desired, but it tells you the square metres you have. For two people is more than enough to sleep, but very justet for eat-in and take life. In general, the experience has been satisfactory.

column1: Very nice experi en ce.Charlotte是位很尽责的房东,会提前主动增加沟通度,通过 (Hidden by Airbnb) app实现即时便捷的联系｡入住那天,由于遇上交通拥堵,导致叫车从机场过来晚了一个小时,非常不好意思,这边的工作人员Elena还是很耐心的等了我们｡离开那天由于是深夜的航班,charlotte也提出可以延期到下午五点退房,后来考虑到航班我们要求延晚到8点退房,增加了不高的费用(50欧),而且elena非常准时的过来帮我们办理了退房｡公寓的地理位置很好,周边有不错的餐厅,而且到老佛爷也不远,只要步行7､8分钟｡周边有多条线路的地铁,最近的一个站点走过去近两三个街坊,去哪里都非常方便｡房间布置的很温馨,因为有孩子一起,所以非常喜欢秋千,房间内的各类设施也很齐全,如有咖啡机､烘干机等｡房东提供了充足的毛巾和浴巾,还有饮用水｡   如果要提一些小缺憾的话,那么就是需要注意到复式的楼梯比较陡,有老人或孩子的话需要注意,而且不太方便把行李搬去卧室(因为入门是在楼上,卧室在楼下),所以使用起来稍微有点不太方便｡另外楼下不算南北通风,且不知是不是有间储藏室的原因,如果卧室的窗不打开的话,刚到的时候是觉得有些味道的｡另外卧室靠着外部街道,入住的两天晚上都觉得相对有点吵,当然也不算很严重,不影响睡眠｡此外,去公寓前要先输入外部大门的密码,记得要提前问房东要,且房子不算太好找,我们入住的那天还好有好心的邻居帮我们指点｡  总体来说,还是很值得推荐的一处巴黎的公寓｡
column5: Very nice experi en ce. Charlotte is very conscientious landlord,will advance the initiative to increase communication degrees,through (Hidden by Airbnb) A app for instant and convenient contact area. Check-in day,due to encounter traffic jams,cause a cab from the airport over an hour late,very sorry,this way staff Elena is still very patiently waited for our room. Leave that day due to late night flight,charlotte is also proposed to be extended to five o'clock check-out,and later taking into account the flight we asked to delay the night to 8 points out,the increase is not high fee(50 Euro),and elena very punctual over here and help us check-in the check-out area. The apartment location is good,surrounding with good restaurant,and to the Galeries Lafayette is also not far,just walking 7, and 8 minutes home. In the surrounding there are many lines of Metro,the nearest one site went over nearly two of three in the neighborhood,where to go are very convenient and great views. Room layout very warm,because have children together,so very like a swing,the room facilities is also very complete,such as a coffee machine, and tumble dryer. The landlord provides plenty of towels and bath towels,and drinking water available. If you would like to provide some small shortcomings,then it's need to pay attention to the Duplex of the stairs are relatively steep,with old people or kids that need attention,but not too convenient to put Luggage moved to the bedroom(because the entry is in the upstairs,bedrooms downstairs),so use up slightly less convenient location. In addition downstairs not counting the North and South ventilation,and don't is not a storage room,if a bedroom window does not open,just to feel some taste. In addition the bedroom against the outside of the street,staying two nights all feel relatively a bit noisy,Of course, also not very serious,does not affect sleep as well. In addition,go to the front of the apartment to the first input of the external door of the password,remember to ask the landlord to,and the house is not too good looking,we check-in the day thanks to kind neighbors to help us pointing area. Overall,still very worth recommended of a Paris apartment.

column1:
It was a good election to stay in Guillaume's house. He was very polite and helped us to get at your home from the airport. The location was amazing and was beside Blanche's underground stop. The flat was very cozy. If I return to Paris I will choose this flat again.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
El apartamento de Guillaume ha sido una buena elección. Es muy amable y nos ayudo a llegar desde el aeropuerto al apartamento, salió a la parada a buscarnos. 17년 2월 아바외 아들 단 둘이서 첫 프랑스 여행을 했어요. 
초행으로 불안함이 있었지만 마리 아줌마의 친절함에 찾아가는 방법과 어떻게 해야할지 꼼꼼히 알려 주셔서 너무나 쉽게 그라고 파리 여행에 도움 되는 내용을 설명(메세지 및 종이에 기록)해 주셔서 좋았습니다.
위치적으로는 지하철 가깝고, 에펠타워는 집에서는 안보이지만 밖으로 나가면 꼭대기가 조금 보이고, 가까이 한식당(Miju)에서 사장님도 친절하고 음식도 맛있었어요. 그리고 걸어서 3분거리의 코인세탁소도 있고요..식당가도 5분내, 슈퍼도 3분거리 근처에 있어요. 참.. 근처 케밥집 맛잇어요. 아들이 정말 좋아 했어요.
Marie 아줌마가 친절하게 이 모든걸 적은 지도를 가지고 계셔서 너무나 쉽게 해결했어요.
저는 너무 친절하시고 감사해서 욕실까지 깨끗이, 방 쓰레기도 깨끗이 정리하고 왔어요.

column1:
파리 여행을 계획할 때 많은 숙소를 알아보았지만 Lucille의 집을 보고 난 후로 바로 마음의 결정을 내릴 수 있었습니다. 

Lucille의 집은 소개된 사진보다도 너무나 멋진 곳이었고 섬세한 부분까지 감동적인 공간이었습니다. 겉으로만 보여지는 모습이 아니라 작은 것까지 고민하고 신경 쓴 흔적이 느껴지는 집입니다. 

파리의 각 구별로 식당과 카페, 쇼핑 장소 뿐 아니라 공원이나 박물관까지 친절하게 설명이 된 Lucille의 추천장소는 파리에 머무는동안 매우 도움이 되었습니다. 언제나 빠르고 친절하게 답을 해주었던 Lucille에게 고맙다는 말을 전하고 싶습니다. 

파리로의 여행을 계획하고 있다면 마레 지구에 위치하고 있는 Lucille의 집을 추천합니다.
