column1:
L'apartament té unes vistes genials de la Torre Eiffel. Durant el dia, és una zona molt animada, però a la nit és més inhòspita i recomano tenir clares les direccions per no fer voltes sense sentit. L'apartament és tal i com apareix a les fotos, tot i que a les fotos dona la sensació de ser més gran del que realment és. Té tot el que es necessita per passar una bona estada a París, i amb tots els serveis que indicava a la web (xampú, gel del cos, mantes, tovalloles, assecador, rentadora, WiFi, i tots els estris necessaris per a cuinar).
A més, el William ens va deixar dues ampolles d'aigua a la cuina de l'apartament que ens van ser realment útils.
És veritat que l'apartament té ascensor, tot i que realment petit (entenc que és una cosa típica dels apartaments antics a París). Per entrar a l'edifici de l'apartament, és necessari polsar una contrasenya a la porta d'entrada (que el William ens va facilitar el mateix matí del viatge), després s'havia d'obrir una porta abans d'arribar a l'ascensor, i per últim, ja s'obria la porta del propi apartament. El primer matí, quan sortíem per la porta, vam veure que a l'entrada de l'apartament (entre la porta del carrer i la porta per arribar a l'ascensor), vam trobar-hi un indigent dormint. Però ja no el vam veure més la resta de dies.

El William ens va recomanar una cafeteria molt a prop de l'apartament (Le Petit Cler), que és realment genial per esmorzar i agafar forces abans de sortir a passejar per París.

En definitiva, l'apartament del William és molt acollidor. En el meu cas, era el primer cop que anava a París i tenia clar que volia allotjar-me a algun lloc amb vistes a la Torre Eiffel. Si el que voleu és despertar-vos i anar-vos a dormir amb una vista meravellosa de la Torre Eiffel, aquest ha de ser el vostre allotjament.

A més, el William ens va anar enviant missatges durant tot el viatge per assegurar-se que tot ens anava bé. El William és una persona molt atenta.
column5:
The apartment has breathtaking views of the great of the Eiffel Tower. During the day, is a lively area, but at night it is the most inhospitable place and I recommend to be clear on the directions to not do laps without sense. The apartment is as shown in the photos, although the photos give the feeling of being larger than it really is. It has everything that you need to spend a good stay in Paris, and with all the services mentioned on the web (shampoo, gel, body, blankets, towels, hairdryer, washing machine, WiFi, and all the necessary utensils for cooking).
In addition, the William left us two bottles of water in the kitchen of the apartment that we were to be really useful.
It is true that the apartment has a lift, even though really small (I understand that it is something that is typical of the apartments old in Paris). To enter the building of the apartment, it is necessary to press a password to the gateway (that the William we facilitated the same morning of the trip), then had to open a door before you get in the elevator, and finally, they opened the door of own apartment. The first morning, when we were going out the door, we saw that at the entrance of the apartment (between the front door and the door to reach the elevator), we find a beggar sleeping. But since we did not see more than the rest of the day.

William led us to recommend a cafe close to the apartment (Le Petit Cler), which is really cool for breakfast and recharging our batteries before going out for a walk to Paris.

In short, the apartment of William is very friendly. In my case, it was the first time that I went to Paris and he was clear that he wanted to accommodate me to some place with views of the Eiffel Tower. If you want to wake-up and go-you sleep with a marvelous view of the Eiffel Tower, this has to be your accommodation.

In addition, the William we was sending messages throughout the trip to ensure that everything went well. William is a person very attentive.

Victoria te un apartament en un barri molt cèntric, a tocar de l'Opera i les gal.leries Lafayette. Les opcions de restauració son infinites, Japonesos, Xinesos, Francesos.... Italians...pastisseries i terrasetes de molt bon estar. El Metro, a 5 minuts de dues linies que et porten o enllaçen amb qualsevol punt de la ciutat.
Definitivament es un lloc inmillorable per un weekend, rel.lació qualitat preu molt bona.

Victoria has an apartment in a central neighbourhood, close to the Opera and the wales.leries Lafayette. The options of restaurants are endless, Japanese, Chinese, French.... Italian...pastry and terrasetes very pleasant. The Metro, 5 minutes from two lines that take you to or connect with any point of the city.
Definitely is a superb place for a weekend, rel.installation quality price very good.

column1:
Molt bon lloc per sentir-se com a casa. Habitació, wc i dutxa (que va genial) en zona independent. Bona cuina ben equipada i gran sala d' estar comunitàries. Molt d' agraïr la rebuda i els preparatius de l' esmorzar.
Dominique és molt respectuosa, facilitadora i acollidora. Ajuda en tot i dóna bons consells per conèixer la ciutat. Sempre demana si cal alguna cosa més.
El bloc es troba en una zona molt ben comunicada pels transports i també per anar a peu a molts llocs. Hi ha comerços, restaurants i tots els serveis necessaris allí mateix, alhora que és una zona tranquil·la x descansar.
Ha estat la nostra primera experiència airbnb i ens quedem amb ganes de repetir, així doncs recomanem aquest pis.
Moltes gràcies per tot Dominique!
column5:
Very good place to feel like home. Room, wc and shower (which was great) in area independent. Good well equipped kitchen and a big room d' be community. Much of thank received and the preparations of the breakfast.
Dominique is very respectful, facilitator and welcoming. Help at all and gives good tips for exploring the city. Always ask if you need something more.
The block is located in an area very well connected by transports and also to go on foot to many places. There are shops, restaurants and all necessary services there, while at the same time it is a quiet area x rest.
It has been our first experience of airbnb and we are left with the desire to repeat the experience, so we recommend this flat.
Many thanks for all Dominique!

column1:
Ericは素晴らしいﾎｽﾄでした｡
とても優しく楽しい人で､話すときはいつも笑いがたえませんでした｡
いつでも連絡が取れ､観光･交通･食事･歴史などたくさんのことを教えてくれました｡

Ericのｱﾊﾟｰﾄはﾒﾄﾛの駅のすぐそばで空港からの移動も便利でした｡ｻﾝ=ﾙｲ島が広いﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰから望め､ﾊﾞｽﾃｨｰﾕ広場･ﾏﾚ地区･ｶﾙﾁｪﾗﾀﾝ地区･ｻﾝｼﾞｪﾙﾏﾝ地区･ｼﾃ島･ﾙｰﾌﾞﾙ美術館などが近いです｡凱旋門まで歩いて一時間くらいだそうです｡様々なﾏﾙｼｪにも徒歩圏内です｡

部屋は写真の通りで､広いﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑ･ふかふかなﾍﾞｯﾄﾞ･調度品は重厚な雰囲気で､優雅なﾊﾟﾘ生活が楽しめました｡ﾄｲﾚが部屋にないので少し気を遣いました｡ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑのお湯はﾊﾞｽﾀﾌﾞにためて使う場合､水になってしまう可能性があります､今回次に熱いお湯が出るまで6時間くらいかかりました｡

Ericは英語でｺﾐｭﾆｹｰｼｮﾝがとれます｡日本を訪れたことがあり､ﾊﾟｼﾞｬﾏに浴衣を用意してくれていたのは面白かったです(でもひもがありませんでした｡次に日本の方が行く場合お土産に浴衣のひもをどうぞ)｡

column1:
L'estudi és molt acollidor, per a dues persones tens suficient i per a pocs dies és ideal!! El Fernando és una persona molt atenta, amable i que ha fet tot el possible perquè l'estancia fos perfecte. L'apartament està molt net, tens utensilis per a cuinar i menjar, també hi ha tovalloles al lavabo i li vaig demanar un assecador de cabells i me'l va facilitar portant-lo a l'estudi el dia abans de l'arribada.
Nosaltres vem arribar molt tard per la nit i ens va ser fàcil poder trobar les claus i entrar. Això si, no té ascensor, són 3 pisos per el que no porteu maletes grans!
L'estudi ens ha agradat molt? Únic inconvenient és que la meva parella és molt alt i xocava amb el sostre i la dutxa una mica petita i baixeta. No obstant per a pocs dies o un cap de setmana està molt bé, ja que té una bona localització i al costat del metro.
Moltes gràcies per tot Fernando, a reveure!
column5:
The studio is very cozy, for two people you have enough and for few days is perfect!! Fernando is a person very attentive, friendly and that has made everything possible so that the stay was perfect. The apartment is very clean, you have utensils to cook and eat, also there are towels in the bathroom and I asked a hair dryer and wear it facilitated getting it to the studio the day before the arrival.
We we arrived very late at night and we were easily able to find the keys and enter. That is, if, there is no lift, there are 3 floors to the that do not bring suitcases, large!
The study we liked it very much? Only downside is that my partner is very high, and were colliding with the ceiling and the shower a little small and careful. However for a few days or a weekend is fine, as it has a good location and next to the metro.
Many thanks for everything Fernando, good luck!

column1:
l'apartament és molt acollidor i tranquil, tot i estar al bell mig de Le Marais, ja que l'edifici es troba al fons d'un dels tradicionals patis (impasses) bastant comuns a la zona.
és molt d'agrair que tingui ascensor (està situat a la quarta planta).
També diu molt al seu favor el fet de disposar de cancel·lació moderada, fet que permet, si és el cas, una anul·lació amb el reemborsament íntegre fins 5 dies abans de la data d'arribada.
Disposa de tot allò que necessites per passar uns dies, encara que alguns estris de cuina -com ara les paelles- haurien de renovar-se. 
El wi-fi ofereix una connexió de molt bona qualitat.
La calefacció i l'aigua calenta funcionen perfectament, molt important si viatges en ple hivern.
El llit és gran i comfortable, tot i que si ets una persona que es mou molt dormint, fa un soroll una mica incòmode.
L'atenció per part de Tatiana, la persona que en tot moment ha sigut el nostre contacte, és excel·lent, tant personalment com per telèfon, si hem necessitat contactar amb ella.
Definitivament, una molt bona opció per passar uns dies a Paris.
column5:
the apartment is very cozy and quiet, despite being in the heart of Le Marais, since the building is located on the bottom of one of the traditional courtyards (impasses) that are quite common in the area.
it is much appreciated that has a lift (it is located on the fourth floor).
It also says a lot in its favour the fact of the cancellation, moderate, fact that allows us, if this is the case, a cancellation with repayment in full up to 5 days before date of arrival.
It has everything you need to spend a few days, although some kitchen utensils such as pans - they should be renewed. 
The wi-fi offers a connection of very good quality.
The heating and the hot water works perfectly, very important if you travel in winter.
The bed is large and comfortable, although if you are a person who moves very sleeping, makes a noise a bit uncomfortable.
The attention to the part of Tatiana, the person who at all times has been our contact, is excellent, both personally as well as for phone, if we need to contact her.
Definitely, a very good option to spend a few days in Paris.

column1: Super ! On a passé un excellent séjour! Je recommande :)
column5: Super ! We had a great stay! I recommend :)

column1: La descripció és correcta. És un apartament totalment reformat, en un edifici interior molt tranquil. Ésta situat a un tercer pis, sense ascensor. El pis estava perfectament net. Els mobles i la decoració son sobris i funcionals, no sembla que estiguis a casa d'una altra persona. Està situat a un barri ple de restaurants i bars, gens turístic. Està a cinc minuts de la Plaça de la República. L'apartament és molt lluminós i comfortable. Els únics inconvenients que hem trobat és que la televisió estava espatllada i no la vam poder veure durant tota la estada i que no hi ha assecadora per a la roba, com diu a la descripció. La nostra valoració és molt bona. El Yohann va estar molt atent i ens va donar les indicacions que li vam demanar sobre la ciutat. Una experiència molt positiva.
column5: The description is correct. It is an apartment completely renovated, in a building the interior very quiet. Ésta located on a third floor without a lift. The apartment was perfectly clean. The furniture and decoration are sober and functional, it does not seem that you are in the home of another person. It is located in a neighbourhood full of restaurants and bars, not cheap. Is five minutes from the Republic Square. The apartment is very bright and comfortable. The only disadvantages that we have found is that the tv was broken and we did not see during the whole stay and that there is no dryer for the clothes, as it says in the description. Our assessment is very good. The Yohann was very attentive and gave us directions that we asked about the city. Very positive experience.

column1:
良いところ :
* ﾎｽﾄの返答が速い｡また､質問に対しても親切な応答を返してくれる｡
* ｲﾝﾀｰﾈｯﾄが非常に速いし安定している｡おそらくWiFiは11ac 対応のﾙｰﾀを使っている｡
* ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが素晴らしい｡体調が悪くなっても簡単に戻ってくることができた｡近くにはｽｰﾊﾟｰﾏｰｹｯﾄやﾚｽﾄﾗﾝがあり､生活にも困らないだろう｡
* ﾏｯﾄﾚｽの寝心地がよかった｡
* 食ﾊﾟﾝや紅茶などを用意しておいてくれた｡朝食として食べた｡食器も一通り揃っている｡
* 街中だが静か｡ｱﾊﾟｰﾄ内の住民(と思われる人々)も親切｡
* 内装がｵｼｬﾚだった｡

悪かったところ
* TVが破損しており視聴できなかった｡ﾌﾗﾝｽ語分からないので困りはしなかったが､descriptionと異なる内容である｡
** 私が破壊したと思われては困ると思いﾎｽﾄに連絡を取ったが､とある旅行者の子供が破壊したため置き換える予定だとの返答を頂いた｡
* ｶｰﾍﾟｯﾄが濡れており､また異臭を放っていた｡おそらく乾いていないまま敷いていたため､臭いが吸着していたか生乾きのようになっていたと思われる｡
** ﾎｽﾄに部屋の外に置いておいていいか相談したところ､ｱﾊﾟｰﾄのｸﾘｰﾆﾝｸﾞ業者に持っていかれないようにしてくれれば置いておいてよいと快諾いただいた｡

column1:
Pésimo apartamento y súper maleduca la propietaria, TODO UNA FARSA, es vergonzoso que no pueda subir las fotografías de la casa, llenas de mugre, polvo, toallas usadas, armarios lleno de ropa, la nevera con comida podrida, ducha sin limpiar y suciedad.
REPUGNATE.
RECOMIENDO NO COGER ESTE APARTAMENTO,HE TENIDO QUE DEJARLO Y PAGARME EL HOTEL Y ÑA PROPIETARIA NO HA QUERIDO DEVOLVER EL DINERO DESPUÉS DE PRESENTAR ESA VERGÜENZA, LAMENTABLE 
ES SU CASA , DONDE EN NINGÚN MOMENTO SE NOS INFORMÓ QUE ERA SU VIVIENDA HABITUAL.
Viajamos una familia de 4 personas!, durante 5 dias, donde no hay ningún espacio para dejar las cosas. Pagando 1000 euros, es normal no podes sacar las cosas de la maleta? 
Es vergonzoso tener que pagar por la limpieza cuando el apartamento esta lleno de mierda, con manchas, toallas usadas.
UNA VERGÜENZA
column5:
Lousy apartment and super maleduca the owner, ALL A CHARADE, it is embarrassing to not be able to upload the photographs of the house, full of grime, dust, used towels, closets full of clothes, fridge with rotting food, shower without clean and dirt.
REPUGNATE.
I RECOMMEND NOT TO TAKE THIS APARTMENT,I HAD TO LEAVE IT AND PAY ME THE HOTEL AND THE OWNER HAS NOT WANTED RETURN THE MONEY AFTER PRESENTING SUCH A SHAME, UNFORTUNATE 
IS YOUR HOME , WHERE IN NO TIME WE WERE INFORMED THAT WAS THEIR USUAL HOME.
We travelled a family of 4 people!, during 5 days, where there is no space to leave things. Paying 1000 euros, it's normal you can't take things out of the suitcase? 
It is embarrassing to have to pay for the cleaning when the apartment is full of shit, with patches, used towels.
A SHAME

column1: Rebuda correcta,  una persona que va enviar la propietaria ens va esperar pacientment,  perque el nostre tren havia arribat amb retard. Apartament molt ben equipat,  encara que la cafetera es practicament per un sol cafe i que no van poder fer servir el forn...afortunadament n'hi ha un munt de restaurants a la bora,  incloent un Domino's Pizza que ens va solucionar un sopar. Barri molt tranquil i apartament molt a prop de 2 estacions de metro i a 10 min. caminant de la Torre Eifel. L'assignatures pendents; sobretot la neteja; no havia espai per la roba,  perque els armaris i tots els calaixos estaven ocupats amb roba dels propietaris; manca de mantemiment general de l'apartament.
column5: Received correct, a person who sent the owner he told us to wait patiently, because our train had arrived late. Very well equipped apartment, even though the pot is almost to a single cafe and that they couldn't use the oven...fortunately there are a lot of restaurants in bora, including a Domino''s Pizza that we had to fix a dinner. Neighborhood very quiet and great apartment close to 2 metro stations and 10 min. walk to the Tower Eifel. The pending issues, especially the cleaning; he had not space for the clothes, because the closets and all the drawers were filled with clothes of the owners; lack of mantemiment general of the apartment.

column1:
Fantàstic! L'apartament és molt confortable, funcional, net i decorat amb molt bon gust. És un apartament molt silenciós i tranquil perquè les finestres donen a un pati interior i no al carrer. El llit és molt còmode!
Està súper ben ubicat en ple barri de Le Marais i a 2 min del metro. Caminant es pot arribar a tot el centre de París, ja que està a 5  min de l'Hôtel de Ville i a 10 min de Notre Dame.
En Jérôme és un amfitrió fantàstic i molt amable, que ens ha donat moltes facilitats.
Sens dubte, quan tornem a París ens agradaria tornar a allotjar-nos en aquest apartament!
column5:
Fantastic! The apartment is very comfortable, functional, clean and decorated with very good taste. It is an apartment very silent and quiet because the windows overlook an interior courtyard and not the street. The bed is very comfortable!
Is super well located in the heart of Le Marais, 2 min from the metro. Walking you can reach the centre of Paris, as it is at 5 min from the Hôtel de Ville and at 10 min from the Notre Dame.
In Jérôme is a host to fantastic and very friendly, which has given us many facilities.
Without a doubt, when we return to Paris we would like to return to stay in this apartment!

column1:
L’apartament està molt ben ubicat, molt a prop de dues estacions de metro. Des d’allà es pot anar a qualsevol punt de París d’una manera molt ràpida. L’apartament és tal com surt a les fotografies. Té una habitació amb llit de matrimoni i un espai separat amb una cortina que té un llit doble. A més té un espai gran que fa de cuina i sala d’estar, amb un sofà llit. La decoració és senzilla però amb bon gust. Té un espai de dutxa i lavabo i el vàter en una altre espai separat. Els electrodomèstics són nous (té rentadora i rentavaixelles i disposa de forn i de microones) i el material de cuina és nou i està ben equipada.

La netedat és correcta tot i que es podria millorar en alguns punts.

En definitiva, hem estat molt a gust a aquest apartament i quan tornem a París intentarem tornar a aquest allotjament.
column5:
The apartment is very well located, very close to two metro stations. From there you can go to any point of Paris in a very quick way. The apartment is just as you see it in the photos. Has a bedroom with a double bed and a separate space with a curtain that has a double bed. In addition it has a large space that makes a kitchen and living room, with a sofa bed. The decor is simple but with good taste. A space has a shower and sink and the toilet in another separate space. The appliances are new (has washing machine and dishwasher and has an oven and microwave oven) and the kitchen equipment is new and is well equipped.

The cleanliness is correct even though it could be improved in some points.

In short, we have been very comfortable in this apartment and when we return to Paris we will try to return to this accommodation.

column1: La higiene i l'endreca de l'apartement eren millorables. Manquen armaris per guardar l'equipatge (els pocs que hi ha estaven parcialment ocupats per estris de neteja i estaven desendracats), penjadors per les jaquetes i endolls al lavabo i l'habitació. Ja la primera nit es va acabar el paper de wàter i no n'hi havia de recanvi. El preu que vam pagar en fer la reserva era un 50% més car que en el moment de l'estada i constituḯa una relació qualitat-preu abusiva. Per contra, la comunicació amb l'amfitrió prèvia a l'estada fou fluïda i la ubicació de l'apartament és francament bona.
column5: The hygiene and the endreca of the apartement were room for improvement. Lack of lockers for luggage (the few that there are were partially occupied by heating and cleaning were desendracats), hangers for jackets and plugs in bathroom and the room. Already the first night was the end of the paper wàter and there was no spare. The price we pay at the time of booking was 50% more expensive that at the time of the stay and constituḯa a price-quality relationship abusive. On the contrary, the communication with the host prior to the stay was smooth and the location of the apartment is downright good.

The apartment is as shown in the photos. It is perfect for couples with 1 child, and ideal if you're a girl!

The Aurelie has always been attentive and friendly, responding quickly to our messages.
If we return to Paris, not dubtarem on repeat!

column1:
Hem estat molt bé. L'apartament és confortable i ben equipat. El barri és molt simpàtic, les vistes sobre el canal de St. Martin donen molta calidesa a l'entorn i la plaça de la República és plena de vida social. No falten botigues i restaurants a prop. D'altra banda l'apartament es troba a una distancia raonable per anar a peu (20 min.) al centre de la ciutat.

L'acollida i sortida han estat molt fàcils i flexibles a les nostres necessitats, cosa que hem apreciat.

Recomanem vivament l'apartament i l'amfitrió.
column5:
We have been very good. The apartment is comfortable and well equipped. The neighborhood is very friendly, the views over the canal St. Martin give a lot of warmth to the environment and the square of the Republic is full of social life. There are plenty of shops and restaurants nearby. On the other hand the apartment is located in a distance reasonable to go on foot (20 min.) in the centre of the city.

The reception and check-out were very easy and flexible to our needs, which we appreciated.

We strongly recommended the apartment and the host.

column1:
El departamento está muy bonito y muy cálido. El barrio está muy practico porque caminas como 5 minutos y llegas al metro. Además hay muchos pequeños comercios donde puedes comprar cosas, desde ropa hasta comida. 

L'appart est très joli est confortable. Le quartier est très pratique car, pas loin, dans environ 5 minutes tu trouve le metro. En plus, il y a beaucoup des petit commerces autour où tu peux acheter des choses comme de vêtement ou de la nourriture.
column5:
The department is very nice and very warm. The neighborhood is very practical because you walk like 5 minutes and you reach the metro. In addition there are many small shops where you can buy things, from clothing to food. 

L appart est très joli est comfortable. Le quartier est très pratique car pas loin, dans environ 5 minutes your trouve le metro. In plus, il y a beaucoup des petit commerces autour où tu peux acheter des choses comme de vêtement ou de la nourriture.

column1:
Notre séjour à Paris fut excellent et nous somme très heureux d´avoir choisi l´appartement de Sidonie. L’emplacement est très bon, avec des moyens de transport tout près, Sidonie nous a donner des recommandations que nous ont fait profiter au mieux. L´appartement a une bonne disposition, assez de place pour nous qui étions cinq et il très confortable, disposons de toutes les commodités pour faire plus pratique notre séjour. Sidonie si bien nous l’avons pas rencontrée a été à notre disposition et nous a laisser des explications très simples pour notre arrivée. C´est un quartier tranquille pas très mouvementée.
Nous vous le recommandons fortement si vous aller à Paris.
Merci Sidonie pour votre amabilité.
Pedro et Paula

Hemos pasado una excelente estadía en Paris, estamos muy contentos de haber elegido el apartamento de Sidonie. Es un apartamento muy bien ubicado en un barrio tranquilo y cerca de todos los medios de transporte. El apartamento es bastante espacioso nosotros éramos cinco y pasamos muy cómodos, además está muy bien cuidado y cuenta con todo lo necesario para hacer más practica la estadía. Si bien no vimos a Sidonie, nos dejó explicaciones muy claras de cómo llegar y se mostró siempre disponible.
Si viajan a Paris les recomendamos evalúen quedarse en el apartamento de Sidonie.
Muchas gracias Sidonie por toda la atención y cuidado que has puesto para nuestra estadía.
Pedro y Paula
column5:
Our stay in Paris was excellent and we are very happy to have chosen the apartment of Sidonie. The location is very good, with of means of transportation nearby, Sidonie us to give recommendations that we have made to enjoy the best. The apartment has a good layout, enough room for us five and it is very comfortable, have all the amenities to make it more convenient for our stay. Sidonie if we have not met her was at our disposal and we had to leave very simple explanations for our arrival. It is a quiet neighbourhood not very busy.
We highly recommend it if you go to Paris.
Thank you Sidonie for your kindness.
Pedro and Paula

column1:
【優點】
⒈整體空間很大很寬敞,很有設計感,採光好,室內挑高,感覺很舒服開放的空間,在家放空一整天也覺得很享受｡
⒉公寓樓下就有超市､速食店､餐廳,很方便｡
⒊從公寓附近的地鐵到巴黎各大景點的交通時間都不長,滿節省時間的｡
⒋接待的Fred人很nice,第一天深夜我們發現沒有提供吹風機,第二天早上就立刻送來了~不過如果能一開始就提供會更好~:-) 
【缺點】
⒈從公寓走到Bastille站需要約12分鐘,路上人行道狀況不是很好,如果需要推大型行李可能需要預估多一點路程時間喲~
⒉中庭的玻璃門不能鎖,晚上睡覺可能會感覺有點不,不過治安應該不錯,後來我都行李箱直接敞開丟房間就出門了,住三個晚上都沒事｡
⒊第二晚,樓上鄰居放很大聲的party音樂直到凌晨將近1點,有點影響到我們休息｡
⒋浴室洗手檯有點堵塞,希望可以改善~:-)
column5:
【Advantages】
The overall space is very large very spacious,great design sense,good lighting,indoor high ceiling,feels very comfortable open space,in the home vent all day but also feel very enjoy as well.
⒉ Downstairs there is a supermarket and fast-food, and restaurant,very convenient location.
⒊ From the apartment near the Metro to all of Paris major sights the travel time is not long,full save time.
The reception of the Fred people are very nice,the first night we found no Hairdryer,the next morning it was immediately sent to the~but if can provide will be better~:-) 
【Disadvantage】
⒈ From the apartment to walk to the Bastille station takes about 12 minutes,the road pavement condition is not good,if you need to push large Luggage may need this a little more walk time yo~
⒉ Atrium glass doors can not lock,sleep at night may feel a little not,but security should be good,then I boot directly Open lost the room and went out,with a stay of three nights were okay as well.
⒊ The second night,the upstairs neighbor put a very loud party music until the early hours nearly 1 point,a little impact to our Seating area.
The bathroom sink is a bit clogged,I hope you can improve~:-)

column1:
L'estudi, és tal i com es veu a la foto, en bon estat, ben cuidat, net i entregat amb les explicacions necessàries. La cuina i el wc són nous, acabats de reformar. La cuina té cafetera amb algunes capsules, nevera impecable i tot lo necessari per poder cuinar un plat senzill. El wc i la dutxa també impecables, amb tovalloles netes, secador, planxa,.. 
L'estudi també està molt ben situat, al barri de Le Marais, un barri amb botigues boniques, restaurants amb encant, bars,... i sobretot una zona segura. 
L'estudi és de dimensions, petites, perfecte per a 2 persones.
I el detall de l'ampolla de vi que en Michael ofereix, també és de valorar. De fet, fa molta il·lusió quan no ho esperes.
Molt recomanable, la veritat.

The study, which is as you see in the photo, in good condition, well maintained, clean, and delivered with the explanations necessary. The kitchen and the toilets are new, just reformed. The kitchen has a coffee machine with some capsules, refrigerator with impeccable and everything necessary to be able to cook a dish simple. The wc and the shower is also impeccable, with clean towels, hair dryer, iron,.. 
The studio is also very well located, in the district of Le Marais, a neighborhood with shops, beautiful, charming restaurants, bars,... and above all, a safe area. 
The study is of dimensions, small, perfect for 2 people.
And the detail of the bottle of wine that Michael offers, it is also of value. In fact, it makes a lot of illusion when you do not expect it.
Highly recommended, the truth.

column1: L'apartament d'en Christophe està molt ben situat, prop de Montmartre i davant mateix d'una estació de metro. Només cal tenir la precaució d'informar-se que  una de les línies de metro tanca els diumenges! Si no t'importa pujar escales trobaràs un pis molt acollidor, originalment decorat, ben equipat amb utensilis de cuina i de bany. Les habitacions són molt tranquil·les i agradables, i el soroll del tren elevat que passa per davant a la nit no se sent des dels dormitoris. També hi ha jocs per nens i un munt de llibres per si tens ganes de llegir quan tornes després d'haver caminat amunt i avall pels carrers de París.
column5: The apartment of Christophe is very well located, near Montmartre and in front of a metro station. You just need to be careful to inform him that one of the metro lines is closed on Sundays! If you don't mind climbing stairs you will find a flat very cosy, with originally decorated, well equipped with kitchen utensils and a bathroom. The rooms are very quiet and pleasant, and the noise of the train high, which passes in front at night they don't hear from the bedrooms. There are also games for children and plenty of books if you want to read when you come back, having walked up and down the streets of Paris.

column1:
位置在瑪黑區真的超級便利,喜歡逛街的人一定會瘋狂的｡下樓對面就是百貨公司,小巷裡也有許多的小店｡附近就有超市咖啡廳餐廳｡樓下隔壁就是有機藥局,我在那買了很多台灣很貴的有機保養品｡
Claudia的黑貓先生好可愛,門沒關好時會看到他在門口張望,超可愛的｡
床是沙發床,如果比較在意床的硬度的人可能要留意｡我自己睡起來沒問題,我老公就覺得躺下後太凹陷了｡
廁所和浴室是分開在兩個不同位置,浴室淋浴處比較小(老房子的規格),對我165cm還算剛好｡對男生或更高大的人來說,洗澡就會比較受限制｡
晚上睡覺時關上窗戶就很安靜,每晚我都睡的很好｡
另外,房間沒有門鎖,對我們來說不影響,但是如果是很在乎隱私的人就要留意,可以事先跟房東確認補上了沒｡

Location in the Marais is really super convenient,like shopping people will definitely crazy. Claudia Black Cat, Mr. Lovely,the door didn't shut good will see him at the door looking,super cute.

The toilet and bathroom is separated in two different locations,the bathroom shower at the relatively small(old house specifications),for my 165cm also count just as well. The boys or more tall person,the shower will be relatively restricted area.
Sleep at night when the Windows closed it was very quiet,every night I have to sleep good night.
In addition,the room has no door,for us to say no impact,but if care about privacy of people should pay attention to,can advance with the landlord to confirm up on the no's.

column1: El resum per l’apartament és: fantàstic. Tant l’ubicació, com el pis, com l’amfitrió han resultat d’allò més acollidors. Pels vols de la Plaça de la República l’ambient és molt acollidor, animat i tranquil alhora, fàcil de trobar qualsevol servei necessàri. L’apartament és petit, res que no sapiguessim ja, però molt cómode, funcional i bonic, el llit perfecte després d’un dia de donar voltes i pujar fins el quart pis sense ascensor. La rebuda perfecte, fàcil de coordinar i en un moment, amb indicacions útils i sempre disponible. Hem tingut una estada genial, recomenable al 100%.
column5: The summary for the apartment: fantastic. Both the location, such as the floor, as the host, have proved the most welcoming. The apartment is small, anything that is not sapiguessim already, but very comfortable, functional and beautiful, the bed perfect after a day of turn and climb up to the fourth floor without elevator. Received perfect, easy to coordinate, and in a moment, with useful information and always available. We had a stay great, recommendable 100%.

column1: L'apartament està ben comunicat, amb una parada de metro molt a prop. És petit però molt net i acollidor. Ideal per a una parella. Nosaltres érem tres i a l'hora de dormir és justet.

column1: L'apartament del Jérôme està molt ben situat per visitar París a peu. La zona ens ha semblat segura, agradable i plena d'activitat: bars, restaurants, llocs de menjar per emportar, supermercats, botigues, fleques, etc. A peu es pot arribar fàcilment a molts llocs d’interès turístic i està ben comunicat en transport públic amb l'aeroport d'Orly. Sobre l'estat de l'allotjament: és acollidor, està ben conservat, la neteja és correcta, està ben equipat (roba de casa, estris de cuina), té molta llum, és espaiós i la distribució és pràctica. Hi hem estat 3 nits dos adults amb un nadó còmodament, encara que no ofereix serveis específics per a nadons (bressol) i s'ha de tenir cura amb els objectes i les finestres, que tenen barana però són baixes. Ens ha rebut una amiga del Jérôme: puntual, molt amable i disponible. Un punt feble de l’apartament és el soroll del carrer que se sent al menjador durant la nit, però no és un problema a l'habitació (és interior). És un bon lloc per allotjar-se a París! Repetiríem.
column5: The apartment of Jérôme is very well located to visit Paris on foot. The area seemed to us pleasant, safe and full of activity: bars, restaurants, places of take-aways, supermarkets, shops, bakeries, etc. On foot you can easily reach many places of tourist interest and is well connected by public transport to the airport of Orly. On the state of the apartment: it is cozy, it is well maintained, the cleaning is correct, it is well-equipped (linen, kitchen utensils), it has great light, is spacious and the layout is practical. There have been 3 nights two adults with a baby comfortably, although it does not offer specific services for babies (crib) and care must be taken with objects and windows, which have a handrail but are low. We received a friend of Jérôme: punctual, very kind and available. A weak point of the apartment is the noise from the street that feels in the dining room during the night, but it is not a problem in the room (that is inside). It is a good place to stay in Paris! Repetiríem.

column1:
钺(yue)是一位非常热情好客又细心周到的帅小伙,是一位早年随父母出国在法国长大学习,取得法国博士学位并在巴黎工作的华人,法语,英语,中文都非常好｡
    他的家虽然不太大,提供给客人的客房虽然也不大,但家里的客厅,厨房,卫生间和淋浴间以及洗衣机,Wifi等都非常实用好用和温馨｡
    钺的家位于巴黎一区,离蓬皮杜艺术中心和卢浮宫和只需走几分钟和十几分钟的路程｡如果从巴黎戴高乐国际机场下飞机,只需乘坐RER B到Châtelet - Les Halles站下车,有一个出站口离钺的家只有不到200米(Châtelet - Les Halles 站很大,是巴黎市区的中心中转站,有多条地铁在此换乘)｡
     我和我的夫人在钺的家住了六天,感觉非常方便和温馨｡钺给了我们很多帮助和旅游指导,也给了我们很大的信任｡我们还见到了钺的母亲和女朋友(她们都不住在此),钺的母亲非常热情和健谈,钺的女朋友非常漂亮和好客｡真是一个温馨的家｡
     我们再次邀请钺及家人回国时到南京来玩｡
column5:
Ax(yue)is a very hospitable and attentive, handsome,is a bit in the early years with his parents abroad in France and grew up learning,to obtain a French doctorate and working in Paris Chinese,English,French,Chinese are very good as well.
His home although not too much,to provide to the guests the rooms although not big,but home to the living room,kitchen,toilet and shower and washing machine,Wifi, etc. are very practical easy to use and inviting home.
Ax home is located in the Paris area,away from the Pompidou Centre and the Louvre and just a few minutes away and ten minutes walk from the apartment. If from Paris Charles de Gaulle International Airport off the plane,just take the RER B to Châtelet - Les Halles station,there is an outbound port from the ax home less than 200 meters(Châtelet - Les Halles station,Paris is the center of downtown transit station,with multiple subway here and ride) areas.
Me and my lady in the ax of the family lives in a six-day,feeling very convenient and cosy apartment. Ax gave us a lot of help and tourism guidance,but also gave us a lot of confidence as well. We also met the ax of the mother and the girlfriend(they live here),ax mother is very enthusiastic and talkative,ax girlfriend is very pretty and hospitable home. What a cozy home and great views.
Once again, we invite the ax and his family to return home to Nanjing to play house.

column1:
집은 굉장히 좋았어요. 뷰도 멋지고 예쁘고 스튜디오 같은 집이었어요. 집에서 사진을 찍으면 엄청 예쁘게 나와요. 넓고 쾌적해요. 그리고 매일 다른 에펠탑을 볼 수 있어요.
단점은 휴지를 제공해 주지 않고 (화장실 휴지 포함) 세탁기도 고장나있으며 고쳐달라고 연락을 했는데도 말로만 체크해본다고 하고 고쳐주지 않아서 사용을 못했어요. 칼도 날카롭지 않아서 마트에서 새거 사서 썻어요. 그 부분에서 조금 불편한 점이 있었네요. 엘리베이터가 있긴한데 반층정도 올라와서 타야해서 짐이 무거운 경우 힘들 것 같아요. 체크인을 도와준 Charlotte이 굉장히 친절했어요.

column1:
Hem passat 4 dies a París en un apartament a París fantàstic: nou, prou ample per 4 persones, decorat amb gust i amb tot allò necessari per viure-hi amb comoditat. El barri és acollidor i vital, amb botigues de queviures per les compres diàries. Es troba a tocar de l'estació de metro Goncourt des d'on es pot arribar al centre de la ciutat en un moment.
L'amabilitat dels propietaris -fent-nos suggeriments relacionats amb el transport públic, llocs a visitar, o facilitant altra informació d'ordre pràctic- ens ha permès una estada a París inoblidable. No podíem esperar un anfitrió i un apartament millor!

We spent 4 days in a fantastic apartment in Paris: new, tastefully decorated and with everything you need to live comfortably . The neighborhood is cozy with shops for daily shopping and very close to the metro station Goncourt from where you can reach the city center at a time .
The friendliness of the owners -making us suggestions related to public transport, places to see or providing other practical information - allowed us to stay even more pleasant and comfortable.
We could not expect a better host and apartment!
column5:
We spent 4 days in Paris in an apartment in Paris fantastic: again, enough width for 4 people, tastefully decorated and with everything you need to live there with comfort. The neighborhood is friendly and vital, with grocery stores for daily shopping. It is located next to the metro station, museum of art, from where you can reach the centre of the city at a time.
The friendliness of the owners -making us suggestions related to public transport, places to visit, or facilitating other order information practical - has allowed us to stay in Paris unforgettable. We could not wait a anfitrió and an apartment best!

column1: 公寓的地理位置非常好,出门不到50米即有8号､9号两条地铁线,多走五分钟即可到达4号线｡咖啡厅､小超市､bar随处可见｡主人Charles非常热情,有问必答,而且非常细心,亲自给了我们很多游览建议,根据他的建议,我们的观光游览计划非常顺利的实现了,此外,主人介绍的Charter餐厅真实物美价廉,吃了两餐,鹅肝､蜗牛回味无穷,强烈推荐朋友去尝试下｡公寓非常干净,安静,是独立的带楼梯的两层越式公寓｡卧室在楼上,客厅和餐厅及洗手间在一楼,尽管空间不是很大,但功能齐全,主人还配了咖啡壶和咖啡,让我们一到家就享受到美味的热咖啡｡因为我说咖啡机不能用,Charles还主动送水壶给我用并热情邀请我们共进早餐,后来发现只是我操作程序不对,咖啡壶没问题,真是不好意思｡总之,一切很完美,非常愉快的巴黎之旅,下次去巴黎,还会再住在这里｡
column5: Apartment location very good,go out less than 50 metres that there is No. 8, and No. 9, two subway lines,walk five minutes to the 4th line as well. Cafe, and small supermarket and bar are everywhere and great views. The owner Charles is very enthusiastic,answer all the questions,and very attentive,personally gave us a lot of tour suggestions,according to his proposal,our sightseeing plans very successfully to achieve,in addition,the owner to introduce the Charter restaurant real inexpensive,ate two meals,foie Gras, and snails food for thought,strongly recommend friends to try the next House. The apartment is very clean,quiet,and is independent with stairs to the two layer style apartment. Bedrooms upstairs,living room and dining room and bathroom on the first floor,although the space is not large,but fully functional,the owner is also equipped with a coffee maker and coffee,let's get home and enjoy the delicious hot coffee available. As I said the coffee machine is not used,Charles also took the initiative to send the kettle to the I with and passion invite us to Breakfast together,and later found just my operating procedure no,coffee is okay,what a sorry area. In short,everything was perfect,very pleasant trip to Paris,next to Paris,will stay here areas.

column1: Pis molt net i equipat. Vam anar-hi a ple estiu en una onada de calor però entenc que en una altre època de l'any si es tanquen les finestres no deu ser un problema. La comunicació amb l'amfitrió és només per missatgeria airbnb, si tens un problema greu com el que vam tenir (no hi havia aigua el primer dia de l'estada) tens un número de l'agència que gestiona pis que bàsicament es dedica a tirar pilotes fora i a no oferir cap solució ni compensació, tampoc per part de l'Yvonne. Finalment vam passar l'incidència a airbnb que fa mediar la sitació i sens ha compensat econòmicament per l'incidència.

column1: Hacemos llegar por mail, igual que lo hicimos presencialmente a la Ms. Lisa C. a las 10.AM. en su oficina de la 199, Rue Sant Dennis de Paris el día 18 de Diciembre nuestra reclamación para rembolsar el importe efectuado por la reserva nº de código HMS8NQA3BJ del apartamento 3, Rue Pastourelle de Paris, por la gravedad en las condiciones de entrega y limpieza del apartamento en referencia a las camas, mobiliario, screens, wc, puertas armarios, lámpara, ventiladores, paredes, falta de jabón en la toilette,…. Engañoso que publiciten de lujoso apartamento. No había ni toallas para el nº de ocupantes, ni paños de cocina, a parte de las condiciones generales que se observan en el reportaje de las fotografías . Inconcebible que el servició de limpieza o ustedes en su defecto no dispongan de una llave auxiliar para entrar en el apartamento, (llave de reserva que se supone deben tener por si se perdiera la depositada en la consigna), lo que supuso que el primer día nos encontramos que nos tuvimos que hacer las camas i la primera limpieza. (la reserva supone entregar el apartamento en condiciones). El apartamento no se limpio (colchones manchados y somier roto), ni reparó al día siguiente 16 diciembre o siguiente 17 de diciembre de nuestra llegada. Esperamos urgentemente el rembolso de la totalidad del importe y rogamos se pongan en contacto con nosotros para resarcir los perjuicios de la estancia causados. Adjuntamos las fotografías del estado en que nos encontramos el apartamento y nos guardamos resto de fotografías en caso de que no haya la voluntad de reembolsar el importe amigablemente, tal y como nos manifestó la oficina de Paris Home – Paris de la 199 , Rue Sant Dennis. (Website hidden by Airbnb) Pueden comparar las fotografías con las del anuncio. Atentamente, Sra. Gemma Attention de M. Roger Rudy, Service Airbnb, Nous envoyons par courrier mail, comme nous l'avons fait en personne à Mme Lisa C. à 10h00. le 18 décembre dans son bureau du 199, rue Sant Dennis à Paris. Notre demande de remboursement du montant fait par numéro de code de réservation HMS8NQA3BJ appartement 3, rue Pastourelle de Paris, par le gravité de la question dans le conditions de livraison et de nettoyage de l'appartement en référence aux lits, meubles, moustiquaires, wc, portes, armoires, lampes, ventilateurs, murs, manque de savon dans les toilettes, .... Publicité trompeuse d'appartement luxueux. Il n'y avait pas de serviettes pour le nombre d'occupants, ni de linges de cuisine, à part les conditions générales observées dans le rapport des photographies. Inconcevable que le service de nettoyage ou à défaut vous n'avez pas une clé auxiliaire pour entrer dans l'appartement, (clé de réserve qui est censé avoir au cas où vous avez perdu le déposé dans le consignation), ce qui signifie que le premier jour nous avons trouvé que nous devions faire les lits et le premier nettoyage. (la réservation suppose de livrer l'appartement dans en conditions). L'appartement n'est pas nettoyé le jour d’arrivé 15 décembre (matelas sale et canapé cassé),...

column1: Gran apartamento. Cama súper cómoda, baño perfecto, cocina ideal para desayunos. Todo muy limpio y nuevo. Cerca de estación metro y en zona muy tranquila. El único problema es que es una planta baja con poca insonoración, pero la calle Lacroix es super tranquila. Recomendable!!
column5: Great apartment. Bed super comfortable, perfect bathroom, kitchen ideal for breakfast. All very clean and new. Close to subway station and in a very quiet area. The only problem is that it is a low plant with little insonoración, but the street Lacroix is super quiet. Recommended!!!!

column1:
The apartment is very comfortable, clean and spacious and the host, Lily, seemed very friendly and helpful. However, we were robbed one day before our trip was finished while we were not at home. The door was not forced which means that someone in possession of the keys entered the apartment and made the perfect robbery. A very significant robbery that we realised only when packing bags in the night with a flight awaiting us the next morning. We could not go to the police and Lily showed no interest whatsoever in helping us, she barely """"worried"""" when I informed her that someone unknown and with bad intentions had full access to the apartment.

El apartamento es muy cómodo, limpio y espacioso y la host, Lily, parecía muy cordial y servicial. Sin embargo fuimos robados un día antes de que se acabara el viaje mientras no estábamos en casa. La puerta no fue violentada lo que significa que alguien en posesión de las llaves entró al apartamento e hizo el robo perfecto. Un robo muy grande pero del que nos dimos cuenta sólo a la hora de empacar maletas en la noche con un vuelo esperándonos a la mañana siguiente. No pudimos acudir a la policía y Lily no mostró el más mínimo interés en ayudarnos, a penas si se “inquietó"""" cuando le informé que alguien desconocido y con malas intenciones tenía completo acceso al apartamento.

L’appartement est confortable, propre et spacieux el la hôte, Lily, paraissait très aimable et serviable. Cependant on a été volé le dernier jour du voyage alors qu’on n’était pas à la maison. La porte n’a pas été forcée ce qui veut dire que quelqu'un en possession de clés est entré dans l'appartement et a fait le hold-up parfait. Un vol très grand mais dont on s’est rendu compte jusqu’à la nuit en faisant les valises avec un vol le lendemain matin. On a pas pu aller à la police pour porter plainte et Lily n’a pas montré le moindre intérêt à nous aider, elle s’est à peine “inquiétée” quand je lui informée que quelqu’un d’inconnu et avec des mauvaises intentions avait le complet accès à l’appartement. 

L'appartamento é molto comodo, pulito e spazioso. La proprietaria ,Lily, sembrava molto gentile e disponibile. Tuttavia, siamo stati derubati un giorno prima di lasciare l'appartamento mentre non eravamo in casa. La porta non era stata forzata, il che significa che qualcuno in possesso delle chiavi é entrato nell'appartamento e ha fatto il furto perfetto. Un furto molto significativo  di cui ci siamo resi conto solo la sera prima di partire, con un volo la mattina presto. Non siamo potuti andare alla polizia e Lily non ha mostrato alcun interesse nell'aiutarci, a malapena si é """"preoccupata"""" quando la abbiamo informata che qualche sconosciuto con cattive intenzioni ha pieno accesso alla casa.

column1:
L'Antoine va ser un amfitrió excel·lent! En tot moment es va preocupar per si ens faltava de res i ens va recomenar bars i restaurants on menjar. Pel que fa l'apartament està molt ben comunicat (tens tres línies de metro a 5 min) i un supermercat (i una boulangerie) a tocar. Estava super net i es 100% fidel a les fotos, perfecte per a 2. 
Si mai hem de tornar a París tenim clar on anar!
column5:
The Antoine was a host to excellent! At all times he was concerned if we needed anything and we had to recommend bars and restaurants in which to eat. Regarding the apartment is very well connected (you have three lines of metro at 5 min) and a supermarket (and a boulangerie) to play. It was super clean and it is 100% true to the photos, perfect for 2. 
If ever we return to Paris we have clear where to go!

ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝはとても良いと思います｡地下鉄の駅から歩いて5分くらいで､ﾄﾗﾑ､ﾊﾞｽも走っているのでどこへいくにも便利です｡周辺は住宅街っぽい感じで､一週間程滞在しましたが夜一人で歩いてもそれほど怖さは感じませんでした｡
ﾎｽﾄのPatricioと顔を合わせることもあったので､直接色々と教えてもらいました｡
洗濯機はありますが､乾燥機はないので近くのｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰを使うと良いと教えてくれました｡部屋でも干そうと思えば干せます｡
家自体の設備は新しくはないですが清潔にされており､特にﾍﾞｯﾄﾞは寝心地がとてもよかったです｡
あえて言うとすれば､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑのﾄﾞ ｱの立て付けが悪いのか､結局一度もきちんと閉められませんでした｡私自身はそれほど気にならなかったので特に何も言いませんでした｡もし気になるようであればPatricioに言えば何かしら対策はしてくれるのではないでしょうか｡
滞在中､体調を崩して部屋にずっとこもっている日もあったのですが､近所も静かですしとても居心地の良い部屋でした｡おすすめです｡

L'appartement était incroyable, très propre et moderne. J'ai aimé beaucoup sa décoration et commodité. C'est très proche des gares de Lyon, Bercy et Quai de la Rapée, et de beaucoup de cafés, magasins et supermarchés. Manuela a été très attentive et gentille. Je recommanderai l'appartement sans aucun doute.

El apartamento es increíble, limpio y moderno. Me ha gustado mucho, sobre todo su decoración y comodidad. Está muy cerca de las estaciones Gare de Lyon, Bercy y Quai de la Rapée, y de cafeterías, tiendas y supermercados. Manuela ha sido muy atenta y amable. Recomendaría el apartamento sin ninguna duda.

L’estudi és tal qual es veu a les fotos i el tracte amb l’amfitriona genial, ens va facilitar informació  pel pàrquing i ens va perdonar que se’ns trenqués una copa ☺️
Recomanable 100%

We chose this apartment for its location, we wanted to get to know Paris and to go with the girls to Disneyland. We were able to catch the Rer to the arc de triomphe q is 10’ walking from the apartment.
The Metro station (3’ walk, perfect to be able to move around the city.
The studio is as it looks in the photos and dealing with the host great, we had to provide information for the parking and he told us to forgive that we broke a cup ☺️
Recommended 100%

column1:
파리에서 10일동안 2명이서 Manon의 집에서 보냈습니다. 처음에 도착해서 사진보다 좋은 컨디션에 놀랐어요. 

*침대: 소파베드라고해서 조금 걱정했는데 170여자 둘이 쓰는데 넉넉하고 편했어요. 라라꾸라꾸같은거 아니고 진짜 침대로 변함. 단, 침대로 바꾸고나면 공간이 거의 없어져서 10일 지내면서 좁기는 했어요. 캐리어 펼치면 끝. 물건 둘 공간이 많이 부족해서 아쉬웠어요.

*위치: Strasbourg Saint-Denis 역까지 도보로 5분이라 어느 관광지를 가든 빠르게 갈 수 있어요. (4,8,9호선이 있음)

*편의시설: 프랑스는 1층이 0층(Ground floor)이라서 2층인 Manon의 아파트는 사실상 3층에 있어요.
건물 밖 0층에 Franprix 마켓이 있어서 내려오면 바로 물건을 살 수 있답니다.
큰길로 나가면 맥도날드 옆에 더욱 큰 Monopolix가 있는데, 제품도 더 많고 가격도 모노폴릭스가 더 저렴한거 같았어요.
그러나 물이나 와인 등 무거운건 바로 아래 프랜프릭스에서 구입하실 추천합니다.
세포라 및 식당도 많고, 저렴한 프랑스레스토랑으로 유명한 Chartier도 가깝지만 딱 그 가격 수준임.

*청결 및 정보: 다리미, 청소기, 세탁기, 식기세척기, 드라이기, 냉장고, 각종 조리기구 및 그릇, 토스터기, 수건 등이 있습니다.
세탁기 사용법이 좀 헷갈리는데, 드라이도 되기는해요. 4번이 기본 세탁이고 7번이 드라이였을거예요. 세제 넣는 곳에 곰팡이 같은게 있어서 찜찜했지만 그냥 사용했어요. 집앞에 코인세탁실도 있어요.

내앵좡고넘흐더어럽규뭐가마니있떠요.토오스터기두네버터치함. 
식기세척기는 사용하기 편했고, 시간 조절할 수 있어요.
그룬데화좡실이드러붐.어두껌껌해지묜좀벌레가나타나셔넘나무섭고드러붐.
시인발을을버더야한다규했눈데안신을슈가없뜸.마디막날바닥딲아쥬구나움.

창문 아래쪽에 라디에이터 있는데 작동 아주 잘되고 화장실 라디에이터에 빨래 널어두면 금방 마름.
세탁기로 드라이까지 하면 엄청 쭈글쭈글 해지기 때문에, 니트류는 꼭 그냥 말리세요.

column1:
한국분들을 위해 한국말로 작성 하겠습니다 :)
1. 위치 : 정말 좋아요. 주변에 마트도 2개나 있고 (monop, franprix 검색하면 나옵니다) 스타벅스도, 그 옆 빵집도 아주 좋아요. 지하철-버스 모두 가까이에 있으며 많은 관광지들과 인접합니다. 위치 정말 좋아요.
2. 화장실 : 바닥이 나무 바닥이라 걸을 때 소리가 납니다만, 저는 지낼만했어요.  방에서 화장실을 가려면 거실을 지나가야하고 화장실-욕실은 따로 분리되어있으니 참고하세요! 따듯한 물 잘 나오고 깨끗하고 좋았습니다. 
3. 부엌 사용 가능해요. 냉장고도요. 깨끗하고 조아요. 
4. 담배 가능합니다. 가끔 거실에서 담배냄새가 나는데 저는 신경을 쓰지 않았지만, 예민하신 분들은 피해주세요. 
5. 강아지 (기스모? 기즈모?) 너무 애교쟁이이고 귀여워요. 혹시 알레르기, 알러지 있는 분들은 피해주세요. 
6. 오전 9시 이전은 화장실 사용을 자제해달라고 부탁받았고, 저는 밤에 샤워+아침에 클렌징워터로 씻는 편이라 불편하지 않았습니다. 혹시 아침 일찍 움직이시는 분들은 고려해주세요.
7. 아 그리고 신기하게도! 천장 불이 없습니다! 밑에 조명이 다 있어요! 저는 너무 좋았어요. 아침엔 조명없이 밝아서 굳이 사용할일도 없었고, 저녁엔 은은하고 하하.

호스트는 너무 친절하고, 많은 정보를 제공했으며 우리를 편하게 대해주었습니다. 완전 추천합니다.

column1:
L'apartament és tal com diu l'anunci. Hem estat allotjats dos adults i un nen de 5 anys amb espai just, però suficient. La cuina està prou equipada per a fer àpats (el forn doble, microones i forn convencional, molt pràctic). Tot estava molt net i ben cuidat. El llit doble és una mica just per gent alta, però molt còmode.
La ubicació és bona, molt a prop de l'Estació de Lió, amb accés a Metro i RER, en un passatge molt tranquil. Està a una passejada de la plaça de la Bastilla i del Marais, i hi ha un supermercat obert fins tard molt a prop. L'únic que milloraríem seria la connexió WiFi, però no ha estat cap problema.
En conjunt, molt recomanable.
column5:
The apartment is just as it says in the ad. We stayed two adults and a child of 5 years with space just, but enough. The kitchen is sufficiently equipped for making meals (oven-double, microwave, and conventional oven, very practical). Everything was very clean and well taken care of. The double bed is a fair bit for people high, but very comfortable.
The location is good, very close to the Station of Lyon, with access to Metro and RER, in a passage very quiet. It is a short walk from the place de la Bastille and the Marais, and there is a supermarket open late very close. The only thing that milloraríem would be the WiFi connection, but this has not been any problem.
All in all, highly recommended.

메세지로 연락하면 바로 답장이 오고 체크인, 체크아웃도 경비원을 통해서 자유롭게 열쇠를 맡길 수 있어서 편했습니다.
처음 열쇠를 받고 열기가 어려워서 Elvire 메세지로 연락했는데 바로 아파트의 주민(또는 경비원)이 Elvire의 연락을 받고 나를 도와주러 왔습니다.
집 분위기도 조용했습니다. 현관문에 들어서자마자 부엌을 지나 안쪽에 방이 있어서 문을 닫으면 조용하고 편하게 잠을 잘 수 있었습니다.
필요한 품목( 수건, 드라이기)은 다 깔끔하게 구비되어있습니다.
다음에 파리에 오게되면 계속해서 이용하고 싶습니다!!!
(Elvire의 집을 이용하기 위해 파리에 와도 될 정도로 좋았어요.)

column1:
He estat una setmana hospedada a l'habitació que ofereix la Tess. Tant l'habitació com el lavabo que comparteixes amb l'altra habitació que lloga estaven nets. A més a més, disposes d'una saleta (també a compartir amb l'altra habitació) on tens una nevereta, un bullidor d'aigua, un microones, una cafetera i els estris perque et puguis preparar el esmorçar o un menjar lleuger. 
Tess, l'anfitriona, es molt agradable i es mostra accesible per ajudarte en tot moment.
column5:
I have been a week hospedada in the room that offers the Tess. Both the room such as the bathroom that you share with the other room rented out were clean. In addition, we have a living room (also shared with the other room) where you have a mini fridge, a kettle, a microwave, a coffee machine and utensils so you can prepare breakfast or a light lunch. 
Tess, anfitriona, it is very nice and shows accessible to ajudarte at all times.

column1:
L'apartament de l´Stéphane és molt maco i l'espai està ben organitzat. Tot i que s'han de pujar escales fins al 4rt pis, l'apartament té recompensa amb les vistes al centre Pompidou, està ben equipat i té una bona connexió de wifi. La localització és molt bona i els carrers estan plens de cafès i restaurants. Stéphane ha sigut un molt bon amfitrió que ens ha ajudat i ha sigut molt atent a les nostres preguntes i al procés d'arribada i sortida.
Recomanable 100%, un lloc on repetiríem.
column5:
The apartment lStéphane is very nice and the space is well organized. Although we have to climb stairs to the 4th floor, the apartment has a reward with the views of the Pompidou centre, is well equipped and has a good wifi connection. The location is very good and the streets are full of cafes and restaurants. Stéphane has been a very good host who helped us and has been very attentive to our questions and the process of arrival and departure.
Recommended 100%, a place where repetiríem.

Lluminós i alegre. Molt net. Cent per cent recomanable.

The street is very quiet and the neighborhood has all necessary services. The apartment is decorated with very good taste, is very pleasant and makes you feel at home. Has everything you need and more. Bright and cheerful. Very clean. One hundred percent recommended.

column1:
Allotjament céntric molt ben comunicat ja sigui per tren o bús a tots els llocs de la ciutat inclús per els aeroports. 
L'únic problema va ser el lavabo que estava al passadís just davant de la porta del apartament.
L'Anthony va ser molt atent i tot el retard que vam patir ( a les 11 de la nit estava previst que arribesim i vam arribar al voltant de la 1 de la matinada) va ser molt amable.
column5:
Accommodation central, very well connected either by train or bús to all the places in the city, even for the airports. 
The only problem was the bathroom that was in the hallway just outside the door of the apartment.
Anthony was very attentive and all the delay that we suffered ( the 11 of the night was expected to arribesim and we arrived around 1 in the morning) was very friendly.

column1:
Experiència i estança a París magnífica. En bona part, gràcies a l'allotjament a l'apartament de l'Emmanuelle. Tot i ser de dimensions reduïdes conté tot l'indespensable per gaudir d'una fantàstica estada a la capital francesa. 
Bona comunicació amb parades pròximes a tots els transports públics i a pocs carrers de l'encantador barri de Montmatre. Pel que fa l'amfitriona, ens va ajudar amb els seus consells a no perdre'ns res durant el nostre viatge a París. Ens va facilitar molt l'arribada al pis i la recollida i el retorn de les claus. 
Sense cap dubte, una experiència per repetir!
column5:
Experience and stay in Paris magnificent. In large part, thanks to the accommodation in the apartment of Emmanuelle. Despite being small in size contains all of the indespensable to enjoy a fantastic stay in the French capital. 
Good communication with bus stops close to all public transport and just a few streets from the charming neighbourhood of Montmartre. Regarding the host, helped us with their advice to not to miss anything during our trip to Paris. We facilitated the arrival to the apartment and the collection and return of the keys. 
Without a doubt, an experience to repeat!

Han estat molt atents, facilitant indicacions per arribar, així com les instruccions del pis. Sempre atents i contestant els nostres dubtes ràpidament.

L'estudi està situat molt cèntric, just a 50 metres del Sena i a 10 minuts de Notre-Dame. 

Molt net el pis, i amb tots els utensilis per poder preparar el menjar. Ens han regalat un obsequi de benvinguda així como cafè, pa,  mantega, llet,...per poder esmorzar tots els dies.

Sense cap mena de dubte, si voleu anar a París, aquest apartament és molt recomanable!
column5:
They have been very attentive, providing directions, as well as the instructions of the floor. Always attentive and answering all our questions quickly.

The studio is located very central, just 50 metres from the Seine river and 10 minutes from Notre-Dame cathedral. 

Very clean the floor, and with all the utensils to prepare the food. Have given us a welcome gift as well as coffee, bread, butter, milk,...to be able to breakfast every day.

Without a doubt, if you want to go to Paris, this apartment is highly recommended!

column1:
EN:
I just returned from a week at Caroline's place, and it was a dream come true! Highly recommended for individuals, couples, and families (might be a bit cramped if you have more than 3 people total).

Pros:
-Location is absolutely perfect! Steps away from Rue du Montorgueil, which is bustling with wonderful restaurants, bakeries, shops (Mariage Frères, A La Mere de Famille, L'Eclair de Genie). A short walk from Forum Les Halles, Le Marais, Centre Pompidou, Louvre, Tuileries Garden, and subway stops nearby. Beautiful cobblestone streets.
-The apartment is clean, spacious, warm, and beautifully designed. No noise issues, and a comfortable bed. The furnished kitchen allowed us to dine in a couple times!

Cons:
-You must walk up 5 flights up to get to the apartment. This was an issue for us especially at check in & check out as we had a lot of heavy luggage.
-Toilet is located separately from bath/sink, so was a little annoying to have to walk to wash my hands.

All in all, Caroline's place is a no-brainer for a perfect nest during your stay in Paris! 
–––––
FR:
Je viens de rentrer chez Caroline après une semaine superbe. Je la recommande avec plaisir aux voyageurs en solo, en couple, et les familles.

Avantages:
-L'appartement se trouve dans un quartier absolument parfait. C'est tout près du Rue de Montorgueil, dans lequel on trouve des restaurants, boulangeries, magasins (Mariage Frères, A La Mere de Famille, L'Eclair de Genie). C'est une courte promenade au Forum Les Halles, Le Marais, Centre Pompidou, Louvre, Tuileries Garden, et aux gares. 
-L'appartement est propre, calme, spacieux, bien décoré, et la chauffage marche bien. Le lit est très confortable. La cuisine est toute équipée, donc on peut manger à la maison.

Inconvénients:
-Il y a 5 étages à monter. C'était un problème avec nos bagages.
-Les toilettes sont séparée du lavabo. (Peut-être ça c'est normal en France? :) )

En somme, l'appartement de Caroline c'est un choix parfait pour votre séjour en Paris!
column5:

The apartment of David is very small but is very well used. There is everything!! It has a style that is youthful and very current. David has been very attentive to our demands. We should not be lacking anything. It is located four steps of la Villette, and in the vicinity there are all kinds of shops.
The apartment is on a third floor and no elevator. Lucky anavem very light luggage!! The relation quality-price of the apartment is correct. It is a flat highly recommended.

En Lionel és un anfitrió excel.lent, ens ha cuidat com si fossim amics de tota la vida des de molt abans d'arribar, fins que ja hem marxat cap a casa.
Espero algun dia poder correspondre'l com es mereix, aquí a Barcelona de la manera que sigui.
Bon rotllo!
column5:
The apartment is perfect, clean and located in a very good spot. The neighbors are quiet and there are services of restaurants, bakeries, patisseries, verduleries close at hand. The metro also.
In Lionel is a anfitrió excel.slow, we have been taken care of as if fossim friends of a lifetime since, even before you get to that we have already gone home.
I hope to some day be able to apply it as it deserves, here in Barcelona of the way that it is.
Good vibes!

column1:

房間如照片,且更注重細節的維護,所以住起比想像的更舒適｡如:乾淨的廚房用品與餐具(這點很重要),好用的吹風機(長髮女孩兒非常需要呀),膠囊咖啡機,曬衣架,chromecast,提供香氛蠟燭等｡
公寓地點也非常好,就在捷運站旁邊､樓下就有家樂福超市､麵包店､咖啡館､藥局,等一應俱全｡

The room as in the photo,and pay more attention to the details of the maintenance,so stay up than to imagine a more comfortable home. Such as:clean kitchen supplies and utensils(this is important),nice hair(long hair girl very much need it!), capsule coffee machine,drying rack,chromecast,provide a fragrance candle.
The apartment location is also very good,right in the MRT station next to it, and downstairs there is a Carrefour supermarket, and bakeries, and cafes, and pharmacies,etc. are all available as well.
Personally very like this apartment,next to Paris, also want to live here as well.

column5: Super host! Thank you

column1:
地理位置很不錯,離 Jussieu 與 Place Monge 兩站都很近,交通十分方便,離 Rue Mouffetard Market 也是步行就可抵達的距離,附近就有Carrefour,每週三五日又有Marché Monge,採買日用品､食材都不是問題｡

房間內的空間不大,兩大人入住已經是極限了,其中廁所及浴室很窄小,刷牙洗臉都很不方便,熱水器的熱水量大概僅能供應一人洗澡吧,另一人要洗可能需要等待半小時以上才可以好好的使用熱水,不然洗到一半就得洗冷水了!而淋浴間雖然有玻璃門做隔間,但門縫並無密合,每次洗澡外面就會有點淹水,總要花點時間處理,此外,浴室的門有點故障,每次開關門都是挑戰;廚房空間也蠻小的,如果做簡單料理是不成問題,只是不太方便｡

房東 Irene 給了很多實用的資訊且問題回覆很快,讓我們覺得她是個負責好溝通的房東,也因為這樣的信任,我們忽略了一些保護房客自己的措施⋯ 例如:拍照紀錄入住時的房間樣貌,還有,對瑕疵太不以為意⋯

入住期間,除了浴室的門,我們陸陸續續注意到了房間裡有些傢俱與裝潢的小破損與瑕疵,例如牆壁上的一些刮痕､餐具缺角､窗簾偶爾會自己掉下來(失去黏性),還有一個我們一度以為是特殊造型的邊桌,某天才發現他是下面支架已缺了一角才呈現傾斜的樣貌⋯ 當然,這些都不是我們所造成的,我們相信 Irene 知道這些都是早已存在的問題,也確認自己在入住期間都很小心遵守房東的規範並維持整潔,更沒有造成任何的損壞｡沒想到就在我們退房後,正進行下一段旅行途中,收到了房東索賠的訊息,說是我們弄壞了那個先前提到的｢特殊造型｣邊桌⋯ 

與 airbnb 客服以｢制式回應｣協調下,過了一週,在我收到裁決通知之前,官方已很迅速的從我的信用卡帳戶扣了這筆款項｡

期望房東可以重新檢視房況,出租前該修的修一修,不要再有下一組跟我們一樣冤枉的房客出現,畢竟,airbnb 不會站在房客這邊,你們知道的⋯
column5:
Location very good,away from the Jussieu and Place Monge two stations are very close,the traffic is very convenient,away from the Rue Mouffetard Market is also within walking distance of the distance,near Carrefour,weekly for three to five days and Marché Monge,buy daily necessities, and the ingredients are not a problem area.

The room space is not more than,two adults check-in already is the limit,where the toilet and bathroom is very narrow,brush your teeth wash your face are inconvenient,the water heater amount of hot water probably only be able to supply a person bathe it,another person to wash may have to wait more than half an hour before you can even use hot water or wash to half would have to wash in cold water! And the shower room although there is a glass door to do the compartment,but the door seam and non-adhesion,each bathing outside will be a little flooded,always take the time to deal with,in addition,the bathroom door a bit of a failure,each switch of the door is a challenge;the kitchen space is also quite small,if to do simple cooking is not a problem,just not too easy as well.

The landlord Irene gave a lot of practical information and problem reply soon,so we think she is the one responsible for the good communication of the landlord,also because of this trust,we have ignored some of the protected tenants own measures⋯ for example:take pictures record upon check-in the room appearance,there are,for blemishes too did not mind⋯

During the stay,except the bathroom door,we gradually noticed the room some of the furniture with the décor of the small damage and defects,for example on the walls of some of the scratches, and Cutlery missing corner, and the curtains occasionally will fall down(lose viscosity),as well as the one we once thought it was the special shape of the side table,some genius found out that he was following the stent has been missing a corner before presenting inclined faces⋯ of course,these are not we caused,we believe Irene know these are long problems,and also confirm your own during your stay are very careful to comply with the landlord's specification and maintain a neat,more did not cause any damage to the apartment. Didn't expect it in the US after check-out,positive for the next segment of the trip,received the landlord claims the message,that is we broke that the previously mentioned"special shape"side table⋯ 

With airbnb customer service to the"standard response"coordination,over a week,on my receipt of the award notification,the official has very quickly from my credit card account for deduction of this amount as well.

Expect the landlord may re-examine room conditions,rental before the repair repair a repair,don't have a group like us wronged the tenant appear,after all,I wouldn't be standing on the tenant side,you know.⋯

column1: Casa come da descrizione. Molto luminosa e con belle porte a vetrata, arredata in modo funzionale e spazioso. I bagni sono privi di finestre ma comunque ben vivibili. La cucina è a induzione, molto funzionale ma per il caffè bisogna attrezzarsi. 7 posti comodi con due stanze indipendenti. L'immondizia va gettata nell'apposito locale al piano -1. Posizione comoda: a due passi dal supermercato Franprix e dalla fermata """"Rue des Boulets"""". Anche la fermata """"Nation"""" è comunque vicina e molto comoda per andate a Disneyland. Consigliata. Grazie Claire!
column5: House as description. Very bright and with beautiful doors to the stained glass window, furnished in a functional and spacious. The bathrooms are without windows but well-equiped. The kitchen is induction, very functional, but for the coffee we need to gear up. Seats 7 comfortable with two independent rooms. The garbage is to be thrown in a special room at the floor -1. Convenient location: two steps from Franprix supermarket and from the bus stop """"Rue des Boulets"""". Also the bus stop """"Nation"""" is close and very convenient to go to Disneyland. Recommended. Thanks Claire!

column1:
L’appartement de Carine correspond aux photos du site. Il est typique des appartements parisiens avec petite cuisine, petite salle de bain, et une chambre et un séjour plutôt spacieux. Il est très bien situé dans Bastille, proche du métro, tout en étant silencieux donnant sur une cour intérieure. Il est bien équipé et décoré de nombreux objets personnels, c’est un vrai lieu de vie. Le checking se fait de façon très simple avec 2 accès avec digicode. Nous avons apprécié ce séjour, merci!

El departamento de Carine corresponde a las fotos del sitio. Es típico de los depa de Paris con una pequeña cocina, pequeños baños pero una recámara y una sala con espacio. Esta muy bien ubicado, cerca del metro, en el Bastille vivo con bars y restaurantes pero tb muy silencioso, orientado sobre un patio interior. Esta muy buen equipado y sigue una decoración muy personal y auténtica como un verdadero lugar de vida. Muy recomendable. Gracias
column5:
The apartment of Carine corresponds to the pictures on the website. It is typical of parisian apartments with a small kitchen, small bathroom, and a bedroom and a living-room rather spacious. It is very well located in Bastille, close to the metro station, while being quiet overlooking a courtyard. It is well equipped and decorated with many personal items, it is a true place of life. The checking is done in a very simple way with 2 access with digicode. We enjoyed the stay, thank you!

El departamento de Carine match a las fotos del sitio. Es típico de los depa Paris con una pequeña cocina, pequeños baños pero una recámara y una sala con espacio. Esta muy bien ubicado, cerca del metro, el Bastille vivo con bar y restaurantes pero tb muy silencioso, orientado sobre un patio interior. Esta muy buen equipado y you follow una decoración muy personal y auténtica como a verdadero lugar de vida. Muy recomendable. Gracias

column1:
Mil gracias Niamey por recibirme en tu casa. Me sentí muy bien recibido y seguro en la casa de Niamey tiene 3 puertas antes de llegar al departamento y en toda mi estancia siempre tuve la facilidad de entrar o salir del departamento. la cama súper cómoda y limpia así como todo el departamento. si bien Niamey habla más que nada francés realmente se esfuerza por comunicarse con sus huéspedes usando aplicaciones de traducción o bien palabras que conoce del idioma de cada huésped, lo cual aprecie mucho. la ubicación es muy buena las líneas del metro conectan directamente con el Louvre y el arco del triunfo. definitivamente recomiendo el departamento de Niamey y de seguro regresaria

Bien que Niamey parle le français plus que tout, elle essaie vraiment de communiquer avec ses invités en utilisant des applications de traduction ou des mots qu'elle connaît de la langue de chaque invité, ce que j'apprécie beaucoup. l'emplacement est très bien les lignes de métro se connectent directement avec le Louvre et l'arc de triomphe. Je recommande vivement le département de Niamey et je reviendrais sûrement

I definitely recommend the department of Niamey and insurance coming back

Well that Niamey parle le français plus tout, elle essaie vraiment de communiquer avec ses invités on utilisant des applications de traduction ou des mots qu'elle connaît de la langue chaque I, ec j apprécie beaucoup. l emplacement est très bien les lignes de métro se connectent direct avec le Louvre et l'arc de triomphe. column1: Margo의 집은 깨끗하고 아주 조용한 곳에 위치해 있습니다. 지하철 역과 슈퍼마켓이 가까이있어 머물기에 불편한 점이 없었습니다. 2주동안 지냈지만 지내며 필요한 모든것이 세심하게 구비되어 있었습니다. Margo 역시 친절하고 신속하게 답변할 준비가 되어있었습니다. 덕분에 파리에서의 기억이 아주 좋게 남았습니다.;)

column1:
Casi 130 escalones que valen la pena para descansar en un lugar limpio, con estilo, acogedor y silencioso. Camille es una estupenda anfitriona que se preocupó en todo momento por nuestro bienestar y nos aconsejó de forma excelente sobre lugares cercanos (¡espectaculares desayunos!). ¡A sólo 15 minutos de la Torre Eiffel! Si volvemos, repetiremos. Carlos & Dulce. Barcelona.
Almost 130 steps that are worth it to rest in a clean, stylish, cozy and quiet place. Camille is a great hostess who cared at all times for our welfare and advised us excellently on nearby places (spectacular breakfasts!). Only 15 minutes from the Eiffel Tower! If we return, we will repeat. Carlos & Dulce. Barcelona.

column1: 整体感觉很好,最主要的是这个街区很安全,附近有学校和使领馆,没有什么闲人游荡,跟前有小超市,水果店,肉店,面包店,一应俱全｡离地铁口走路5分钟,离RER_C的车站也不远,走路去铁塔20分钟,房间的沙发床拉开只是一张1.5M大的双人床,睡着有点挤

Away from Metro mouth walk 5 minutes,remove from RER_C station also does not far,walk to the Eiffel Tower 20 minutes,the room sofa bed opened just a 1. 5M large double bed,sleep a little squeeze

column1:
La Laura ha estat en tot moment comunicativa i molt amable a l'hora de facilitar-nos qualsevol informació.
L'apartament es troba en un lloc molt cèntric, proper als principals llocs turístics. Potser per això en un carrer poc tranquil, amb molta gent tant de dia com de nit. Això és un inconvenient si es viatja a l'estiu i fa calor, i has de dormir amb les finestres obertes.
D'altra banda, l'apartament és ideal si es viatja fora d'aquestes dates.
Està ben comunicat. El metro és a la cantonada i si s'arriba en cotxe, hi ha un pàrquing també molt a prop.
column5:
Laura has been at all times communicative and very friendly at the time to provide us with any information.
The apartment is located in a very central place, near the main tourist sites. Perhaps this is why, in a little street, quiet, with lots of people both day and night. This is a drawback if you are traveling in the summer and it's hot, and you have to sleep with the windows open.
On the other hand, the apartment is ideal if you are traveling outside of these dates.
It is well connected. The metro is at the corner and if you arrive by car, there is a car park also very close.

Encontramos todo lo que necesitabamos mates, azucar cafe, vajillas, plancha, secadora sacacorcho etc y un golazo para nosotros el contar con modem de internet movil, que nos permitio tener internet por toda la ciudad mientras conociamos lugares. column1: Hem estat a l’apartament del Nabil 5 dies, som una familia de 2 adults i dos nens(6 i 9 anys) els nens van dormir al sofà llit i nosaltres a l’habitació. Els matalassos eren còmodes i l’apartament es senzill i net. Està a un segon pis sense ascensor pero no són gaires escales. A 5 minuts del metro Piere Lachaise i del autobús 69 que et porta als lloc mes emblemàtics de París. Un parell de dies vàrem anar caminant de Notre Dame fins a casa(35 minuts). Al davant de l’apartament hi ha una boulangerie i un supermercat obert fins tard. A 2 minuts un Carrefour express que esta obert fins i tot diumenge. El Nabil sempre atent treballa a la cafeteria de baix, si necessites quelcom sempre està disponible. Sens dubte si tornem a París ens allotjarem aquí.
column5: We have been in the apartment of Nabil 5 days, we are a family of 2 adults and two children(6 and 9 years) children were sleeping on the sofa bed and us in the room. The mattresses were comfortable and the apartment is simple and clean. Is in a second floor without lift but few stairs. 5 minutes from the metro Piere Lachaise and the bus 69 which takes you to the site most emblematic of Paris. A couple of days we went walking from Notre Dame to his house(35 minutes). In front of the apartment there is a boulangerie and a supermarket, open until late. 2 minutes away is a Carrefour express that is open even on Sunday. The Nabil always attentive works in the cafe below, if you need something always is available. Without a doubt if we return to Paris we'll host here.

column1: Com a família de quatre adults, la nostra estada al pis de la Fleur va ser molt agradable. Tot i que no ens vam veure, sempre va contestar puntualment als nostres missatges, i va saber trobar la manera que ho tinguésssim tot a punt quan ho necessitàvem. En viatjar en cotxe, perquè la nostra estada a París formava part d'una ruta per França, el poder tenir un pàrquing al mateix edifici ens era bàsic, i no va haver cap problema. La zona on és el pis és multicultural, però tranquil·la i ben dotada (supermercats, restaurants...) i les parades de metro són a cinc minuts. El pis és la vivenda de la Fleur i la seva família, tot a disposició. Per sentir-se com a casa!
column5: As a family of four adults, our stay in the apartment of Fleur was very nice. Although we did not see, always replied promptly to our messages and was able to find the way that you tinguésssim everything ready when it is needed. When traveling by car, because our stay in Paris was part of a route to France, the power to have a car parking in the same building as us was basic, and did not have any problem. The area where is the apartment is multicultural, but quiet and well equipped (supermarkets, restaurants...) and the metro stops are five minutes away. The floor is the housing of the Fleur and her family, all available. To feel like at home!

column1:
Clotilde was super nice and welcoming, and let us feel very comfortable in her appartment. The check in and check out were very smooth. She provided towels, shampoo, shower gel, etc. She speaks perfectly english.

Very good location. The neighborhood is cute and tipically parisian, with cafes, restaurants, supermarket, shops and metro stations nearby. It is near Le Bon Marché and in a walking distance from Saint-Germain-des-Prés main streets, Museum Rodin and Le Jardin du Luxembourg (Luxembourg Gardens). We definitely recommend staying at Clotilde’s apartment. We had a great stay.

Clotilde foi super simpática e nos fez sentir muito à vontade em seu apartamento. O check in e check out foram super tranquilos. Ela nos forneceu toalhas, shampoo, gel de banho, etc.

Ótima localização. O bairro é fofo e tipicamente parisiense, com cafés, restaurantes, supermercado, lojas e estações de metrô próximas. Fica perto do Le Bon Marché e é possível caminhar até as ruas principais do bairro Saint-Germain-des-Prés, o Museu Rodin e o Jardim de Luxembourg.
Nós com certeza recomendamos o apartamento de Clotilde. Tivemos uma estadia adorável.

Van viatjar la meva mare i els meus tiets. Aquesta es la seva evaluació:
L'apartament està en una zona molt ben comunicada i tranquil·la, amb tots els serveis propers (comerços, transport, restaurants, lloguer de cotxe, pàrquing...).
Estava tot molt net i ordenat. El tracte ha sigut molt correcte, Serge sempre ha estat disponible quan l'hem necessitat, atent i cordial.
Cal dir, però, que és ideal per una parella, per més persones és una mica petit.
Gràcies ^.^
column5:
Traveled my mother and my uncles. This is their evaluation:
The apartment is in a very well communicated area and quiet, with all services nearby (shops, transport, restaurants, car rentals, parking, etc.).
Everything was very clean and tidy. The treatment has been very proper, Serge has always been available when we have need, attentive and cordial.
It must be said, however, that is ideal for a couple, for most people it is a little bit small.
Thank you ^.^

column1:
숙소는 교통이 편리한 곳에 있으며 가까이에 베이커리, 마트, 식당들이 있음.
교통이 편리하나 번화가와 같이 시끄럽지 않아 밤에 조용하고 편안하게 잘 수 있음.
마주치면 인사하는 친절한 이웃들이 있음.
Marthieu는 게스트의 편의를 우선적으로 생각하고, 조용하게 지내는 편이며, 마치 자신의 집처럼 편안하게 만족하며 머물 수 있음(조식은 간단한 토스트와 커피 또는 차, 과일주스) 그리고 답장이 매우 빠름.
여자인 본인이 일주일동안 머문 결과 여자 혼자라도 무리없이 안전하게 지낼 수 있는 곳이었음.
후기를 보면 엘리베이터가 없어서 불편하다고 하는 글이 있으나 체크인,체크아웃때 Marthieu가 캐리어를 들어주기 때문에 큰 불편은 못느꼈음.
결론: 강력히 추천합니다.
column5:
The hostel is conveniently located close to bakery, supermarkets, restaurants.
Convenient transportation to The such as noisy, quiet at night and comfortable sleep.
Housekeeping staff are friendly neighbors.
Marthieu is a guest of the hotel first, thinking quietly to spend, and your home satisfied and you can stay(Breakfast is a simple toast and coffee or tea, fruit juice) and reply very fast.
A woman this week Hair results women alone, even without safe the place was.
The Elevator is not uncomfortable to post or check-in,check-out time Marthieu the carrier heard here was.
Conclusion: strongly recommended.

column1:
-L'apartament és molt petit, tal i com es veu a les fotos. És un pis vell que necessita fer una reorganització i renovació dels espais i del mobiliari.
La habitació dels convidats és còmode, tot i que podria millorar  (cal netejar la moqueta i seria adequat treure els objectes inutils pel viatjers, com l'aspiradora i el piano de l'habitació), tot i això, és perfecte per passar uns dies a Paris si solament vols anar a dormir. 
El gat és genial i li agrada el contacte amb les persones.
-L'amfitrió és molt cordial i educat. A nosaltres ens ha ajudat en tot el que hem necessitat. Gràcies Mathieu! 
-Ubicació: és excel·lent, just al costat de la parada de metro Pigalle , en el barri de Montmatre ( el millor barri per a nosaltres).
L'ubicació i l'hospitalitat de Mathieu és un aspecte que compensa altres coses no tan bones de l'apartament.

En definitiva, la qualitat i el preu correcte.
column5:
-The apartment is very small, as can be seen in the photos. It is an old flat that needs to make a reorganization and renovation of spaces and of furniture.
The room of the guests is comfortable, although could be improved (you need to clean the carpeted floor and would be suitable to remove the objects inutils by viatjers, such as the vacuum cleaner and the piano in the room), however, is perfect to spend a few days in Paris if you only want to go to sleep. 
The cat is cool and likes the contact with people.
-The host is very cordial and polite. To us has helped us in everything we need. Thanks Mathieu! 
-Location: excellent, right next to the metro stop Pigalle , in the neighborhood of Montmartre ( the best neighborhood for us).
The location and the hospitality of Mathieu is one aspect that makes up for other not so good things of the apartment.

In short, the quality and the correct price.
