column1: L'estudi és molt agradable, està molt ben decorat, té tot el que cal: nevera, rentadora assecadora, rentaplats, microones, planxa... La localització és ideal, al costat de la línia 1 del metro, a 10 minuts caminant de Notre-Dame, del Pompidou, del Museu Picasso. És molt assolellat. La placeta de davant té molts cafès, però el soroll no és problema tancant bé les finestres. L'acollida i atenció immillorables. Vam estar sense gas dos dies a causa de un problema en la canalització del carrer, i malgrat que no era responsable, els propietaris ens van reemborsar una nit d'allotjament. Tornaria a allotjarme encantat. Ho recomano.
column5: The studio is very nice and is very well decorated, has everything you need: refrigerator, washing machine, tumble dryer, dishwasher, microwave, iron... The location is ideal, next to metro line 1, 10 minutes walk from the Notre-Dame cathedral, the Pompidou centre, the Picasso Museum. It is very sunny. The little square in front has many cafes, but the noise is no problem closing the windows. The welcome and service excellent. We were without gas for two days because of a problem in the channelling of the street, and despite the fact that it was not responsible, the owners we were reimburse one night's accommodation. Would allotjarme happy. I highly recommend it.

column1: 地段非常好,地铁站旁边,交通便利,周边安全,生活设施齐全,公寓楼是典型的巴黎公寓,住处闹中取静,很喜欢早上推开百叶窗看窗台的花草和远处的城景｡房间布置温馨有格调,一直保持整洁,可见女主人的勤快有品位｡CICILE和PIERRE都非常热情,乐于分享,我们聊天极其愉快,我受益匪浅｡两个小朋友可爱,有教养,猫咪有个性的小酷｡好想念每天早上蓬松酥软脆的大可颂,特意拍照发给我妹让她馋~(¯▽¯~)~如果希望感受巴黎人的生活,入住C&P家是极好的选择✺◟(∗❛ัᴗ❛ั∗)◞✺
column5: Location very good,next to the metro station,convenient transportation,perimeter security,living facilities,apartment buildings are typical of Paris apartments,accommodation quiet,like the morning open the shutters to see the windowsill flowers and the distant views of the city area. The room is furnished in a warm style,kept neat,visible mistress of the diligent tasteful apartment. CICILE and PIERRE are very welcoming,willing to share,we chat very happy,I learned a lot as well. Two children cute,educated,Kitty has the personality of a small cool room. Missed in the morning fluffy soft brittle great song,specially take pictures sent to my sister to let her greedy~(▽~)~if you want to feel the Parisian life,check-in C&P homes is an excellent choice✺◟(∗❛ัᴗ❛ั∗)◞✺

column1:
Lydia母女都挺友善,家里有三只可爱的猫｡我们一到就给了我们两杯热茶｡房子的交通状况很好,十分钟就能打一个大的换乘中心｡

不好的方面有:房间的照明,房间里面和厕所很暗,晚上不太方便｡洗脸化妆都是半抹黑的｡

还有充电的电线板必须把灯点上才能充电晚上很难睡着,所以你们注意一定要看好｡

整个房子的地暖不太好,我都冻感冒｡

总的来说还是不错的~

Lydia and her daughter are very friendly,the home has three lovely cats, and great views. We A to give us two Cup of hot tea as well. House of the traffic situation is very good,ten minutes will be able to play a large transfer center area.

Bad aspects:the lighting of the room,inside the room and toilet is very dark,the night is not too convenient location. Face makeup is half-discredited.

Also the charging wire and plate must put the lights on to charge the Night difficult to fall asleep,so your attention must be optimistic about as well.

Throughout the House Underfloor heating is not very good,I'm freezing cold house.

column1: La ubicació es genial per anar a veure la Torre Eiffel, el Sena, restaurants, etc. L'apartament te varies coses a millorar com: un forat a la porta que et podrien veure des de fora, una rentadora a l'habitacio que no hi fa cap servei ja que al bany ja n'hi ha una altra, mobiliari en mal estat i sobretot ens hauria agradat trobar llençols i mantes nets. Besma es cordial i ràpida en contestar els missatges, ens va venir a rebre el seu cosí que sabia castellà, tot i que vam fer tard pel caòtic tràfic de París, va ser molt amable i ens va aconsellar bé.
column5: The location is great to go to see the Eiffel Tower, the Seine, restaurants, etc. The apartment you several things to improve such as: a hole in the door that you could see from the outside, a washing machine in the utility that it does not any service because in the bathroom there is another, furniture in poor condition and, above all, we would have liked to find sheets and blankets clean. Besma is friendly and quick in replying to messages, we came to receive his cousin that he knew Spanish, although we did later by the chaotic traffic of Paris, was very friendly and we were advised well.

column1:
Experiência indescritível... Começando pela atenção ao check in: quem me recebeu foi a sogra da Naima, Fernanda! Ela me recebeu pois viu que eu era brasileira e com uma ação de carinho e atençao acharam melhor alguem que falasse meu idioma. Nessa recepção  já percebi o carinho para que tratam os hospedes. Ao chegar no apartamento fiquei surpresa pela organização, limpeza, cuidado, beleza do ambiente. Tudo mil vezes melhor do que está nas fotos. Elas me orientaram em todos os detalhes, desde alimentação, transporte, mapas, lazer... Um ponto a se destacar é a localização e acessibilidade. Tudo perfeito... a poucos metros de uma estação de metro, RER e de pardas de onibus. De fácil acesso a todos os pontos de Paris. Fernanda sempre prestativa e comunicativa. Não tenho nada a pontuar de criticas, apenas elogios. Meu MUITO OBRIGADA por tudo! Vocês, sem dúvidas, são as melhores anfitriãs que conheço!

Une expérience indescriptible ... À commencer par l'attention à l'enregistrement: qui m'a reçu était la belle-mère de Naima, Fernanda! Elle m'a accueilli parce qu'elle a vu que j'étais brésilienne et avec une action d'affection et d'attention, ils ont trouvé quelqu'un de mieux qui parlait ma langue. A cette réception, j'ai remarqué l'affection pour les invités. En arrivant à l'appartement, j'ai été surpris par l'organisation, la propreté, les soins, la beauté de l'environnement. Tout mille fois mieux que sur les photos. Ils m'ont guidé dans les moindres détails, de la nourriture, du transport, des cartes, des loisirs ... Un point à souligner est l'emplacement et l'accessibilité. Tout est parfait ... à quelques mètres d'une station de métro, RER et station de bus. Accès facile à tous les points de Paris. Fernanda toujours utile et communicatif. Je n'ai rien à critiquer, juste des compliments. Mon MERCI pour tout! Vous êtes, sans aucun doute, les meilleures hôtesses que je connaisse!

Indescribable experience ... Starting with the attention to check in: who received me was Naima's mother-in-law, Fernanda! She welcomed me because she saw that I was Brazilian and with an action of affection and attention, they found someone better who spoke my language. At this reception I noticed the affection for the guests. Upon arriving at the apartment I was surprised by the organization, cleanliness, care, beauty of the environment. Everything a thousand times better than it is in the photos. They guided me in every detail, from food, transportation, maps, leisure ... One point to highlight is the location and accessibility. All perfect ... just a few meters from a metro station, RER and bus station. Easy access to all points of Paris. Fernanda always helpful and communicative. I have nothing to criticize, just compliments. My THANK YOU for everything! You are, without a doubt, the best hostesses I know!

우선 교통이 편리했습니다. 마레지구 바로 앞동네고, 바스티유 광장과 리옹역과 가까워서 바르세유 갈 때와 스위스로 넘어갈 때 걸어서 역까지 이동했네요. 편리했습니다. 오히려 에펠탑 쪽 메인 관광지보다 더 좋았던 것 같아요.
바로 앞에 Café de l'Industrie라고 있는데, 가격도 괜찮고 음식이 좋아요. 많이 붐비지도 않구요.
에어비앤비숙소 여러군데에서 묶어봤는데 아파트에서 기다리는 호스트는 처음이었어요. 프랭크는 친절하고, 비행기 지연 때문에 오래 기다렸어도 짜증내거나 재촉하지 않아서 고마웠습니다.(물론 계속 연락하고 업데이트를 했어요.)
숙소는 깔끔했고, 화장실도 청결했습니다. 전자렌지도 있고 오븐까지 잘 구비가 되어있었어요.
에어컨은 없어요. 파리 어느 숙소든 에어컨은 없을것같긴하네요.. 선풍기가 있었으면 더 좋을 것 같아요.
저녁에는 거리가 약간 시끌시끌해서, 빛이나 소리에 민감하신 분들은 안대나 귀마개 챙기시는게 좋을 것 같아요. 저희는 프랑스 와인을 매일 마셔서 매일 꿀잠잤습니다.
다음에 파리에 간다고 해도 단연코 가능만 하다면 여기에요. 최고의 호스트, 최고의 숙소였습니다. 고맙습니다.

Très bien aux premiers abords, j ai été littéralement viré de l appartement le dernier jour à 9h30 au lieu de 11h sous prétexte qu’un autre résidant devait rentrer dans les lieux. Pas très honnête, de mauvaise fois et pour couronner le tout, harceler au téléphone toute la journée . 

Very good at first, Sabrina literally kicked me out of the place at 9.30am instead of 11 am . Her excuse: she was expecting someone to come at 11 am and she need time to clean . So why renting until 11 am? Was very rude to me after that and was texting me every 2 minutes until I told her that I will go to the police for harassment. Very bad experience! 

Al primero , fue una buena experiencia. El lugar es muy bonito y el barrio muy tranquilo . El último día, la señora me botó del apartamento a la 9.30 pero alquilé hasta la 11 de la mañana . Me dijo que le da igual y que tiene una otra persona a la 11 y que tengo que ir para que empieza a limpiar . Me mando mensajes todo el día con insultas y no paro antes que la amenazo de ir a la policía . No es una buena persona y no la recomendó.

column1: Apartament ben situat, amb diverses parades de metro i bus molt aprop. Supermercats a dos minuts i bars per prendre alguna cosa o sopar enfront mateix. Vam gaudir amb les vistes al Sagrat Cor que es podien veure des del saló. I si, és un 6 sense ascensor, però després de pujar les torres de Notredame i l'Arc de Triomf, les escales per arribar al Sagrat Cor o les moltes passejades per la ciutat, pujar a l'apartament per descansar mirant aquelles vistes  va ser com un premi. L'apartament disposava de tot allò que podiem necessitar. No vam poder conèixer a en François i l'Alice en persona, però anava responent tot el que li necessitàvem consultar. A l'arribada ens estava esperant una persona per donar-nos les claus.
column5: Apartment well located, with several metro stops and bus very close. Supermarkets in two minutes, and bars for a drink or dinner compared to the same. We enjoy the views to the Sacred Heart that could be seen from the living room. And yes, it is a 6 without a lift, but after climbing the towers of Notredame and the Arc de Triomphe, the stairs to get to the Sacred Heart or the many walks through the city, go up to the apartment to rest looking at those views was like a prize. The apartment had everything that podiem need. We could not know François and Alice in person, but I was answering everything that you needed to check. On arrival we was waiting for a person to give us the keys.

column1:
Les fotos no li fan justícia, és un apartament preciós, si t’agrada la decoració i les cases amb personalitat, aquesta és la teva opció. Molta llum, moltes plantes, molta tranquilitat tot i estar en un primer pis...els meus dos fills i jo hem passat 3 dies súper agradables amb la sensació d’estar com a casa nostra. 
Té la parada de Congourt (línia 11) a 2 passes, amb la qual cosa arribes amb un no res al centre (Chatelet), i a 1 horeta de l’aeroport amb tren. Súper ben comunicada.
El barri té encant, multicultural, amb el canal Saint Martin al costat on pots anar a dinar una pizza mentre prens el solet...i amb supers, tendes i restaurants a cada racó. 
Molt recomenable!
column5:
The photos don't do justice, it is a beautiful apartment, if you like the decor and the houses with personality, this is your option. A lot of light, many plants, very quiet despite being on the first floor...my two children and I have past 3 days super-pleasant with the feeling of being like at home. 
You have the stop of Congourt (line 11) 2 steps, with which you'll be arriving with nothing in the center (Chatelet), and 1 horeta from the airport by train. Super well-connected.
The neighborhood has charm, multicultural, and with the canal Saint Martin, next to where you can go to eat a pizza while you take the solet...and with supers, shops and restaurants in every corner. 
Highly recommended!

column1:
Hola, 
Ens vam allotjar al pis de la Caroline i va ser perfecte. Molt bona comunicació i atenció per part de la Caroline.
L'únic inconvenient pujar els cinc pisos després dels llargs dies de visita per Paris. Tot i així no va ser pas un inconvenient. 
Moltes gràcies per tanta amabilitat.
column5:
Hi, 
We stayed in the first floor of the Caroline and it was perfect. Very good communication and attention on the part of Caroline.
The only drawback to climb the five floors after the long days of visit to Paris. Even so, it was no way a drawback. 
Many thanks for so much kindness.

column1:
十分感谢Georges and Carole的热情接待｡虽然这栋房子的入口十分容易找到,但是Georges还是坚持在路边等我们,还帮助我把行李拿上楼｡他和他妻子热情地向我们介绍房子内的厨房用品等等,一切都十分完善并且整洁｡
重点是Georges给了我们的巴黎之行非常完美的小建议,让我们得以非常方便的享受到了 Le Marais区非常特色的cafe, market和一些景点｡
Georges的公寓交通非常方便,无论是地铁还是巴士或者步行,都十分简单方便｡公寓周围有数不清有特色的cafe或餐馆,短短5天时间根本无法完全体验周围以及巴黎这座城市的魅力!
再次感谢Georges和Carole,感谢他们干净舒适的公寓,强烈推荐给大家!

The focus is on Georges to our trip to Paris perfect tips,let us be very convenient to enjoy the Le Marais area a very distinctive cafe, market and some of the attractions of the area.
Georges apartment transportation is very convenient,whether it is the subway or bus or walk,are very simple and convenient areas. Around the apartment there are countless features of cafe or restaurant,a short 5 day time simply unable to fully experience the surrounding as well as Paris, this city of charm!
Thanks again to Georges and Carole,thanks to their clean and comfortable apartment,highly recommend it to everyone!

CDG 공항에서 한 번에 가는 RER B와 가까운 곳에 위치했다. 근처에 메트로가 2개가 더 있어 교통이 좋은 편이다. 도보 20분 거리에 방브 빈티지 마켓으로 걸어갈 수 있고, 도보 8분 거라에 훌륭한 공원도 있다. 맛있는 베이커리도 있고, 식재료를 살 수 있는 곳도 많았다. 
체크인 시 차근차근 설명해줬고, 집은 무척 깨끗했다. 식기 세척기, 세탁기 등 모든 것이 잘 작동했다. 
다만, 4층까지 엘리베이터 없이 올라가는 건 힘들었다. 에어컨이 없지만 6월 날씨에 힘들딘 않다.

column1:
Amazing Paris experience!!!
Super nice area with no tourist trap around! 
Supermarket: Franprix. Night food: kebab till late. Underground: super close! Jules Joffrin Station.
Buy the Navigo card at the airport for transport.
Walk distance from Montmartre church. 
I'm 1.85m and moved well in the apartment.  =p
Ahmet and Maria are great guests! Want to come back soon! 
---
Ótima experiência parisiense!!!
Área muito boa sem agito turístico em volta. 
Supermercado: Franprix. Comida da noite: kebab numa esquina perto. Metrô: super perto. Estação Jules Joffrin. 
Compre o cartão Navigo assim que chegar no aeroporto para transporte na cidade! 
Dá pra ir a pé na Montmartre. 
Tenho 1.85 e me virei bem no apê haha .
Ahmet e Maria são ótimos anfitriões! Quero voltar logo!

column1:
Jerome은 매우 친절합니다. 우리가 숙소에 들어서자마자 시원한 맥주를 건네주며 반갑게 맞이해주었습니다. 기꺼이 Jerome은 우리 가족을 위해 숙소 주변을 함께 산책하며 마트, 식당, 빵집 등을 소개해주었습니다. Jerome이 알려준 빵집은 정말 맛있었습니다. 저는 파리에서의 5일 동안, Jerome의 숙소에서 편히 지냈습니다. 저와 아내, 그리고 10살, 12살짜리 아이들이 함께 머무르기에 충분했습니다. 숙소 근처에 Monopix와 Franprix 마트가 있어, 우리는 숙소로 오는 길에 먹을 것을 사와서 요리도 하고, 거실에 있는 멋진 TV(삼성 프레임)로 영화도 봤습니다.

숙소는 Metro, RER Station과 매우 가까워 샤를드골 공항, 베르사유 궁전까지 바로 가는 RER를 탈 수 있어 매우 편했니다. 버스도 조금만 걸으면 바로 탈 수 있는 위치에 있습니다. 그래서 우리는 아이들 때문에 주로 버스를 탔지만, 숙소에서 루브르, 노트르담 성당까지 충분히 걸어다닐 수 있습니다.

파리을 가족과 함께 여행하신다면, 기꺼이 추천합니다.
column5:
Jerome is very friendly. We stay in in the cool Beers handed and greeted. Willing Jerome is for our family around the hostel to walk together to and Mart, restaurant, bakery, etc introduction. Jerome this informs the bakery is really delicious. I was in Paris 5 days, during Jerome's stay in. Me and the wife, and 10-year-old, 12-year-old children to stay together. Near the hostel on Monopix and Franprix have a look, we stay on the way to eat and cook, in the living room with TV(Samsung Frame)movies I've seen.

column1: Vam estar una setmana al apartament de la Joanna i hem quedat molt satisfets. Un apartament molt acollidor i en una bona zona plena de serveis, accés al metro, restaurants i supermercats. El pis es tranquil i petit ideal per 2 adults i un o dos nens. El llit i el sofà llit eren cómodes i (Website hidden by Airbnb) a punts a millorar : només vam trobar a faltar un microones i el parquet de la casa era una mica vell i feia fressa al trepitjar. La relació amb la Joanna va ser bona, ens va atendre al arribar al apartament i al marxar. Recomanable, si tornem a Paris repetirem!
column5: We spent a week in the apartment of Joanna and we have been very satisfied. An apartment very cosy and in a good area full of services, access to the metro, restaurants and supermarkets. The apartment is quiet and small, ideal for 2 adults and one or two children. The bed and the sofa bed were comfortable and (Website hidden by Airbnb) points to improve : we only missed a microwave oven and the floor of the house was a bit old and was rattling in the tread. The relationship with Joanna was good, we had to attend to get to the apartment and to leave. Recommended, if we return to Paris we repeat!

L'apartament esta molt a prop de la parada de metro 12 Vaugirard. A l'arribar abans d'hora ens va deixar les claus en una caixa que hi ha al costat de les bústies i ens va costar una mica trobar-les, tot i això, ell estava molt atent al mòbil per si teniem algun problema.
L'habitació és molt bonica i acollidora, hi havia calefacció i al llevar-se donava gust mirar per la finestra i veure una part de París,  ja que és un 6é i té vistes maques de les cases parisines.
Hi havia tovalloles i sabó, tot i que en vam comprar perque en quedava poc.
Ha estat una estada molt bona amb en Pierre, es molt atent i la casa inspira tranquil·litat i bona armonia.
column5:
The apartment is very close to the metro stop 12 Vert. The reach ahead of time left us the keys in a box next to the mailboxes and it took a bit to find it, however, and he was very attentive to the mobile phone if we had any problems.
The room is very nice and comfortable, there was heating and the young woman gave a taste to look out the window and see a part of Paris, as it is a 6th and has beautiful views of the houses parisines.
There were towels and soap, even though we bought it because in was just.
He has been a stay very good with Pierre, is very attentive and the house inspires a sense of tranquillity and good harmony.

column1:
Albane a été super, on a eu bonne communication et elle m'a donné des conseils pour manger et parcourir Paris. La localisation de l'appartement est magnifique, au plein centre ville de Paris, on a tout fait à pied. Cependant la propreté de l'appartement laisse beaucoup à désirer. Elle a changé les draps, mais le sol de la chambre, le toilette, la salle de bain et la cuisine étaient sale.
Albane tuvo mucha disposición en darnos consejos para comer y recorrer la ciudad, tuvimos buena comunicación y fue muy amable con nosotras. El departamento es hermoso y su ubicación es excelente, en pleno centro de París, recorrimos todo lo turístico caminando. Sin embargo, si bien ella cambió las sábanas, el departamento estaba sucio, había polvo por todas partes y el baño estaba roto.
column5:
Albane was super, on a eu la bonne communication et elle m ' a donné des conseils pour manger et parcourir Paris. The localisation of l appartement est magnifique, au plein centre ville of Paris, on a tout fait à pied. Cependant la propreté de l appartement laisse beaucoup à désirer. Elle a changé les draps, mais le sol de la chambre, le toilette de la salle de bain et la cuisine étaient comes out.
Albane was very available to give us tips for eating and touring the city, we had good communication and was very friendly with us. The apartment is beautiful and its location is excellent, right in the centre of Paris, we toured all the tourist walk. However, while she changed the bed linen, the apartment was dirty, there was dust everywhere and the bathroom was broken.

column1:
L’apartament del Julien és preciós, ampli, molt net i acollidor, ideal per una família.
Immillorable ubicació al costat de Montmatre i a prop de tots els serveis que necessitàvem (metro, restaurants, supermercat...)
Hem estat com a casa i si tornem a Paris, segur que repetim a l’apartament del Julien
column5:
The apartment of Julien is beautiful, spacious, very clean and cozy, ideal for a family.
Unbeatable location next to Montmartre and close to all the amenities that we needed (subway, restaurants, supermarket...)
We have been at home and if we return to Paris, sure that we repeat in the apartment of Julien
